short_description: In "4x4 Offroad Racing Nitro" different courses in the three game modes single race, time trial and competition are waiting for the future race champion, and that is you!!! The rapid offroad races lead you through dusty deserts, slippery ice regions and dense forests during day and night.

name: Defense Of Greece TD
short_description: A game of the genre "Tower Defense".

name: Guts and Glory
short_description: A game about father and son riding their bicycle through obstacle courses of death, and other fun family experiences. Created by HakJak

name: Abyssal Zone
short_description: Abyssal Zone is a tile-based puzzler which incorporates a distinctive mechanic: you can only turn clockwise. Go solo and make your way through puzzles while being watched by two entities, or bring a friend along and play the exclusive co-op stages.

name: Inner Chains
short_description: An FPS horror game set in a surreal, dark and deadly biomechanical world never seen before. Humankind is just a small part of a hostile universe. Want to survive? Discover its secrets.

name: ReCore: Definitive Edition
short_description: From creator Keiji Inafune and the makers of Metroid Prime comes the ReCore: Definitive Edition, an action-adventure crafted for a new generation. As one of the last humans, forge friendships with robotic companions and lead them on an epic adventure through a dynamic world.

name: SYMMETRY
short_description: A research spaceship reaches an abandoned planet. Nothing is what it seems here and the situation quickly slips out of control. Can the crew manage to survive and get back home?

name: The Last Journey
short_description: The Last Journey is an ultimate post-nuclear exploration game in which you travel the universe to find a new planet suitable for mankind to live on after the Earth was destroyed in a nuclear war.

name: Bridge to Nowhere
short_description: Are you looking for a brief, immersive, and exciting experience to demo VR to first-time users? What about a quick way to get your heart pumping? Then Bridge to Nowhere is the game for you. Step onto a squeaky bridge 80 feet in the air as high winds surround you. Do you have what it takes to jump off?

name: Tee Time Golf
short_description: Hit awesome shots and have multiplayer fun with your friends. Level up your golfer and get cool gear. Build amazing golf courses and share them with the world. Supports both VR and Non-VR.

name: Brumm
short_description: In the spirit of old arcade classics like Super Sprint and old computer racers like Micro Machines, you race on a topdown track with up to five players online or local in front of your computer.

name: Sheep Tag 2
short_description: The classic cat and mouse game! It's Sheep against Wolves in this unique blend of real-time strategy and survival. Sheep Tag 2 will put your reflexes to the test in this thrilling and competitive experience bound to keep you on the edge of your seat. Party with up to 16 players online.

name: Octave
short_description: Octave is a point 'n click horror-adventure game with elements of action. Dark woods, monsters, paranormal activity, nice puzzles - all this is present in the game.

name: Dungeon Of Doom Puzzle
short_description: Guide the little viking hero through 100 levels of monsters, traps and danger in this puzzle game. All you have with you is your puzzle solving skills, agility and timing.

name: Arizona Rose and the Pirates' Riddles
short_description: Join Arizona on her epic treasure-hunting quest, with over 200 levels of picross to solve and numerous treasures to discover.

name: Bomber Crew
short_description: Chocks away! Bomber Crew is a strategic simulation game, where picking the right crew and keeping your bomber in tip top shape is the difference between completing your mission or losing it all! USAAF DLC NOW AVAILABLE! FLY THE ICONIC AMERICAN BOMBER!

name: Supa Kila Monsta Hunta
short_description: surreal VR arcade

name: Heroine Anthem Zero -Sacrifice-
short_description: 《Heroine Anthem Zero : Sacrifice》 is an epic fantasy 2D side-scrolling ARPG with Japanese voiceovers and support for 7 languages. In a world unforgiven by God, it is a story of sacrifice and survival ten years in the making. Come and enter a world of adventure from long ago.

name: Hop Step Sing! Kisekiteki Shining! (HQ Edition)
short_description: Enjoy a front row ticket to a performance by Japan's newest idol group: Hop Step Sing! Niina, Mikasa and Shikiri will sing and dance their way into your hearts in this, an immersive VR experience of their debut single: "Kisekiteki Shining!".

name: Xenonauts 2
short_description: Wage a global war of resistance against an alien invasion. Command turn-based tactical battles, build a network of covert bases, directly control your fighter wings, and achieve strategic victory in a simulation of asymmetric warfare against a technologically superior foe.

name: Dante's Forest
short_description: Dante's Forest is an immersive VR action horror game built for the HTC Vive. Alone in a haunted forest you find yourself surrounded by wave after wave of ghostly creatures. By pure chance you discover that the beam of your flashlight will vaporize the sinister specters... for a while.

name: The baron got you again
short_description: In The baron got you again you play as a secret agent, prisonner from a cell in the middle of Argentina, inside the secret base of the vile Baron Von Rimmel. Your mission : escape, and as fast as possible. Search the different rooms to discover the bunker's exit without being noticed.

name: Doodle God: 8-bit Mania - Collector's Item
short_description: Every Element & Reaction Have Been Beautifully Redrawn with this amazing 8-bit skin to original Doodle God. If You Loved Doodle God - try this unique version of one of the most original games in the world.

name: Bad Dream: Coma
short_description: Welcome in Bad Dream: Coma. A point & click game where unique minimalistic art style creates an unforgettable and atmospheric experience. Travel through the surreal and disturbing dreamland where everything depends on your actions. You can't die but you can suffer greatly...

name: Feel The Snow
short_description: Choose one of the characters and start your journey. The game has many interesting things in store: building, crafting, puzzles, bosses, mystery, laughs, quests etc.

name: Delila's Gift
short_description: Delila's Gift is a VR Picture book created using Tilt Brush! It tells the story of a small sea creature named Delila and her struggle to understand belonging, ownership, fear, othering, and the darkness surrounding her.

name: Raging Titan
short_description: Build your towers, plan your efforts, watch out for changing paths and strike back against the alien invaders in this challenging tower defense game!

name: HAUNTED: Halloween '85 (Original NES Game)
short_description: A brand new NES homebrew game independently developed by Retrotainment Games and released on an NES cartridge. This game adheres to all NES hardware restrictions... all graphics, color palettes, data processing and audio fully comply regardless of how maddening it was to achieve :) HH85 is a classic, 8-bit beat' em up / platformer that...

name: A-Escape VR
short_description: A-Escape is an escape room game built from the ground up for VR. Will you escape in time?

name: Crimson Nights
short_description: Crimson Nights is a Multiplayer Dungeon Crawler Video Game

name: Chicken Chase
short_description: Chase Chickens in VR! They will run away from you and keep hatching more chicks until you free them. But, don't let the coop get too crowded!

name: Remind Yourself
short_description: Remind yourself maintains a characteristic of suspence and horror where the story has a fundamental role and you must guess because it has multiple endings. It will prove your mind. It is needed that a player be quiet in extremes moments to maintain himself alive. Each step will be an experience to have into account.

name: Shatter Quest
short_description: Put your tennis skills to the test in this Virtual Reality adventure game. You must save the angels from the terrifying monster that has come to this peaceful forest. Break the walls that trap you and find the path to battle this evil creature and save the forest.

name: Party Golf
short_description: Party Golf is a crazy and competitive couchplay game for one to eight players. Party Golf combines simple 2D physics, a procedurally generated world and over a trillion different gameplay combinations.

name: Help Me Doctor
short_description: Become a doctor! Help to diagnose patients. Be careful with the documentation, signatures etc. Decide what your ethics will be. What will you do, when a patient comes and say: Help me, doctor!

name: Sleeping Valley
short_description: Sleeping Valley - a new arcade platformer game In Sleeping Valley you only have one life to live and it's your job to see how far you can take this cute character on his brutally hard journey.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel
short_description: At Thors Military Academy, Erebonia’s best learn everything from the art of war to liberal arts. First year Rean Schwarzer learns he’s been selected to join the controversial Class VII, and they’ll need to deal with more than just class warfare--they’ll need to safeguard their country from chaos.

name: TURGUL: RAPID FIGHTING
short_description: A new story fighting game awaits to be played. Turgul: Rapid Fighting will bring your fighting game experience to a whole new level.

name: Dead Hungry
short_description: Dead Hungry is a fast-paced VR game developed by Q-Games, creators of the PixelJunk series. Restore zombies to human form by loading up huge hamburgers and hurling them to the grateful undead. Your weapons of choice are burgers, pizza, fries--and anything else you can pick up!

name: Stationeers
short_description: Stationeers puts you in control of the construction and management of a space station to run by yourself or online with your friends. Complex atmospheric, electrical, manufacturing, agriculture, and gravitational systems require your thought and management at all times!

name: BULLET SOUL
short_description: Blending classic shooting game design with a substantial dose of modern day bullet hell and flashy pyrotechnics, Bullet Soul has it all! Play through multiple modes, all designed to welcome newcomers to the genre, but also challenge experts aiming for ever higher scores.

name: Death Dojo
short_description: Enter Death Dojo... A one-on-one death match to become the ultimate samurai.Real battle is scary. Other games may lead you to believe you can slash through hoardes of foes with ease. This is not true. To beat your enemy you must face your fears. In Death Dojo you must face your nightmare and defeat him.

name: Delicious - Emily's Christmas Carol
short_description: Warm up your Christmas spirit with this amazing cooking story game!

name: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock
short_description: In Battlestar Galactica Deadlock™ you’ll take command of the Colonial Fleet in defense of the Twelve Colonies during the First Cylon War. Lead many different types of ships in this 3D tactical game. Every decision counts, your strategy will be vital – can you ensure mankind’s survival?

name: River City Melee : Battle Royal Special
short_description: This is the most recent installment of the ‘Kunio-Kun’ franchise recreated as a fun and easy fighting game with the fighting aspects taken and upgraded from River City Super Sports Challenge ~All Star Special~.

name: Sacred Almanac Traces of Greed
short_description: Chief Engineer Jonathan Finch had gone missing after a powerful railroad tunnel explosion and the ensuing investigation has forced the company to freeze all work on the track. As the main investigator, you discover that the collapse may not be related to natural events, but rather a mysterious and ancient civilization.

name: Holy Avenger
short_description: Based on the most successful Brazilian comics, Holy Avenger allows you to live all the saga from the comics in Hack and Slash / Beat 'em Up style, through the world of Arton in the universe of Tormenta to find the desired Ruby of Virtue.

name: Kriaturaz - O Guardião das Lendas (Base)
short_description: This is a Open Source Game. Kriaturaz is a game that presents the myths and the Brazilian legends in an unprecedented way and brings characters that are part of a new concept of legends, myths and Brazil folklore, conducted from a survey designed, which makes Kriaturaz an innovative game.

name: Delicious - Emily's New Beginning
short_description: Play Delicious - Emily's New Beginning and enjoy a new phase in Emily's life! Can you help her run Emily's Place together with taking care of a beautiful daughter?

name: Catan Universe
short_description: Trade – build – settle: Become Lord of Catan! Get to know Catan and play the starter scenario in multiplayer mode. Purchase the complete base game, expansions, card game and much more to discover the entire Universe of Catan.

name: SOULCALIBUR VI
short_description: Bring more than your fists to the fight! Featuring all-new battle mechanics and characters, SOULCALIBUR VI marks a new era of the historic franchise. Welcome back to the stage of history!

name: Happy Empire - A Bouquet for the Princess
short_description: Will the princes have to help one another, or will they become enemies? Will they choose a dangerous way and collect the rarest flowers or take a short cut? What bouquet will the Princess get? It’s all up to you!

name: Driftwatch VR
short_description: Driftwatch VR is a Vive on-rails shooter. Travel on the back of a giant whale or helicopter platform to explore our magical realm infested with evil goblins. Defeat the enemies by unleashing your skills with magic mastery, the longbow or dual wielding crossbows…

name: KARDS - The WW2 Card Game
short_description: KARDS, The World War II Card Game, combines traditional CCG gameplay with innovative mechanics inspired by classic strategy games and real battlefield tactics. Take command and challenge other players in grand-scale warfare on the ground, air, or seas.

name: 21 Steps to Soul
short_description: Classic old-school hardcore two dimensional horror platformer. Following Daniel in this God forsaken world, the players are going to collect the elements to open doors, run for their dear lives from the evil monsters and make their way further and further into the darkness.

name: Children of Orc
short_description: Lead your civilization of Orc Children, stranded on a planet. Build infrastructure, explore continents, and instruct your peers. Children of Orc mixes the point-and-click adventure game with real-time-strategy. You control one single Orc and will have to instruct your tribe on how to explore and exploit your habitat.

name: Blood Ties
short_description: Warfare Studios (Ashes of Immortality, Shining Plume) is back with a new tale involving vampires and epic fights with this great RPG.

name: Limelight VR
short_description: Limelight puts you on stage and provides the perfect virtual conditions for practicing public speaking or performance skills. Become a fluent presenter, overcome anxiety, attain higher self-confidence, and be a happier person. Are you ready to step into the Limelight?

name: Darwin Project
short_description: In Darwin Project, ten inmates must survive the elements, track each other, fight, craft tools, and use their social skills to be the last one standing. It's a unique take on battle royale with a Show Director to influence the match and Spectator Interactions to create a one-of-a-kind game show.

name: Milkmaid of the Milky Way
short_description: Milkmaid of the Milky Way is an award-winning point-and-click adventure game in rhyme that combines a gripping story with puzzles and exploration. What happens when a young milkmaid sees an alien craft in a fjord in 1920's Norway?

name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION
short_description: Nobunaga's Ambition, the first of the series, was released in 1983. Players assume the mantle of either Nobunaga Oda or Shingen Takeda and strive to conquer the entire land (17 areas in the Kansai and central Japan region). They manage their country to make it rich, then prepare their military forces.

name: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika
short_description: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika was first released in 1985. Players become Temujin, who has just become 20, and fight to unify the Mongolian plains. After uniting the plains, you are renamed Genghis Khan and proceed to conquer Eurasia. Grow rich and conquer all you come across.

name: Ishin no Arashi
short_description: "Ishin no Arashi" was released in 1988. Its story takes place at the end of the Tokugawa Shogunate. Players become one of the 12 key figures of the time, like Ryouma Sakamoto, Kaishuu Katsu, and Takamori Saigou.

name: NSFW ~ Not a Simulator For Working
short_description: NSFW or Not a Simulator For Working is a casual simulator game where you try not to work anytime you can. Be careful of your snitching co-worker and strict boss. If you get caught, you will get FIRED !!!

name: Feather
short_description: Feather is a multiplayer game about exploration, relaxation and immersion. Transform yourself into a bird, take flight, and enjoy a zen-like, picturesque landscape on your own terms. Swoop, glide, and backflip your way around mysterious locations to uncover hidden paths that only birds can follow!

name: Badiya: Desert Survival
short_description: Badiya is a Sandbox Survival RPG set in the WWI era desert lands. Badiya challenges you to brave the sands, take part in wars, ply the spice routes, or hunt for treasure as you strive to fulfill your ambitions.

name: BULLET SOUL INFINITE BURST
short_description: Bullet Soul Infinite Burst is a vertically scrolling shooting game crossing old-school gameplay with a bullet hell twist. It adds numerous gameplay enhancements over its predecessor, Bullet Soul, not least of which is Burst Mode. The same aggressive, bullet-cancelling gameplay, now with more destruction, more coins and more tunes.

name: Driver Booster 4 for Steam
short_description: Driver Booster 4 for STEAM, as a powerful & easy-to-use driver updater, provides 1-click solution to rapidly & securely update 400,000+ drivers including the outdated, missing and faulty ones. Moreover, game components and game-related drivers are supported for enhanced gaming experience.

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2017
short_description: Take on the role of coach of your own team with Pro Basketball Manager 2017. Start your career as head of the team of your choice, be they rookies or legends, and lead your players to victory!

name: Beastiarium
short_description: Beastiarium — plunge into the mysterious world full of secrets and monsters, its atmosphere will keep you in suspense throughout the story. The action takes place in underground Petersburg in the beginning of 20th century, one hundred years later since the monsters invaded the planet.

name: Muffled Warfare - Echolocation Shooter
short_description: Muffled Warfare is a multiplayer first-person echolocation shooter where everyone is blind and uses sounds to SEE, SHOOT and SILENCE their competition. You've heard of that blind superhero that dresses up like a devil in red right? Yea, think that, but with guns.

name: Super Blackjack Battle 2 Turbo Edition - The Card Warriors
short_description: Follow the invitation by the owner of the largest Casino in Las Vegas and Godfather of the local most influential crime family and face the other participants in a face-off game of cards. Only the best will fly to Vegas to challenge the Godfather himself in a final match!

name: NBA Playgrounds
short_description: Classic NBA arcade action is back! Take your “A” game to the playground and beat the best in high-flying 2-on-2 basketball action. Practice your skills offline, play with up to three others and take your talents online to posterize your opponents with acrobatic jams and ridiculous displays of skill.

name: AL･FINE
short_description: In this world, three races — humans, sprites, and kindred — coexist with their own unique cultures. Some races are on good terms with each other, such as humans and sprites, while others may not get along as well, such as sprites and kindred, but they all live together more or less harmoniously.

name: Companion
short_description: This is a story about a future before the stars are extinguished. A man who knows about the end and decides to live lavishly and a girl who will turn his life upside down. Their story begins when she steps under his umbrella.

name: Natural - Beyond Nature -
short_description: Natural - Beyond Nature - is a Mystery, Drama, Supernatural Visual Novel. Follow the story of Olea in a chance encounter with two residents of a quiet island, Flori and Llima. Can Olea save them from their cruel yet inevitable fate?

name: A Trip to Yugoslavia: Director's Cut
short_description: A TRIP TO YUGOSLAVIA is an experimental interactive game with a theme of the old VCR player (with the ability to REWIND, PAUSE and FASTFORWARD).

name: Bedfellows FRENZY
short_description: Bedfellows FRENZY is a hard as hell, arcade style, smash and loot. Where you rage through various themed levels, demolish buildings, tear though the National Guard, and battle multiple bosses. Crushing and stomping your way up the leader boards, and to ULTIMATE VICTORY!

name: Hollow Bliss
short_description: HOLLOW BLISS, the horror game where death, choice, and consequences all come back to haunt you.

name: Hover Hazard
short_description: 1 - 4 player/s. Navigate your spaceship inside a deadly arena. Dodge bullets, saws and lasers, while avoiding and using other obstacles in your way.

name: Akuya
short_description: Have you played enough serious games? Do you want to relax and have some fun with your friends? Well, maybe you can laugh on your own, it is only your decision.

name: The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker
short_description: YOU are a psychiatrist, trying to solve a murder whilst treating the unusual patients of the recently deceased Doctor Dekker. Type a question - patients reply in full screen video and have questions for you too but be careful what you say. Your words determine their eventual fates, and your own!

name: Harvester of the dead
short_description: Uncover the dark story of the 'Harvester of the Dead' in this pixel art Metroidvania. Battle infernal bosses, explore mysterious worlds, gain experience, and unlock powerful spells as you fight to close the gates of hell!

name: PHAT PHROG
short_description: Phat Phrog is an all new one of a kind free to play, physics based addictive arcade game that puts your reflexes and skills to the test (and also your patience).

name: GO AWAY, THERE'S KUMIS OVER THERE!
short_description: This arcade runner is about a horse and our favorite drink - kumis! Collect cookies, pick up items like multipliers, bombs, HPs and try to get as high score as you can. Cookies are your best friends in that game!

name: Button Tales
short_description: Button Tales is a breathtaking and challenging Match 3 game with innovation mechanics. This is a real fresh perspective on the Match 3 genre. Meet cute characters and explore the breathtaking environment. The wonderful music and effects will help you delve right into the game.

name: Vigilantes
short_description: Vigilantes is a combat focused, turn-based tactical RPG set in the crime riddled city of Reiker. The game offers hardcore squad-level combat in a gritty neo-noir setting, intel gathering through surveillance and interrogation, a detailed character system, base facilities, crafting, and more.

name: Anamorphine
short_description: Explore the past as you resolve the present in Anamorphine, a surreal adventure of rendered emotions. Journey into the mind of the main character, a young man in denial. His subconscious is pushing him to face his past - or be consumed by it.

name: Shiver: Poltergeist Collector's Edition
short_description: After inheriting a manor in England, you begin to explore the Kangale Estate and discover its history!

name: Roofbot
short_description: Solve clever puzzles atop stunningly surreal rooftops in this meditative, gorgeous-sounding game.

name: Parallyzed
short_description: A frantic adventure platformer - control twin sisters at the same time as they navigate intense, hand-crafted parallel worlds!

name: VOI
short_description: Do you think 1 + 1 = 0 is correct? So what do you think about "black + black = white" statement?

name: The Land of Dasthir
short_description: Join Terret in his small, but dangerous adventure through a mysterious and forgotten land of Dasthir

name: Nother: an indie souls-like
short_description: Enter the dangerous open world of Nother.

name: Rise High
short_description: Rise High is an arcade action game in which you have to defend your workers from an alien invasion while they try to build skyscrapers!

name: Ghostdream
short_description: When you die, you normally have only one simple wish - to return and tell them - "Hey, guys - it's OK" But returning is not easy...

name: Wanderland
short_description: Wanderland, the mystery adventure from Artogon, the world-famous creator of great casual adventures series such as Shiver, Treasure Seekers and Depths of Betrayal. Sleeping Beauty has been kidnapped! Explore a world full of temples, crypts, and more.

name: Princess of Tavern Collector's Edition
short_description: Feed the Tavernland and win the Prince’s heart.

name: Convicted Galaxy
short_description: Stranded in an unknown galaxy full of escaped prisoners who grow stronger with every passing moment. Build a space station, upgrade your ship, and dogfight your way out of the galaxy. Take risks when necessary, but don't forget that you only have one chance.

name: Shady Brook - A Dark Mystery Text Adventure
short_description: Explore a small country town with a twisted secret in this dark, Twin Peaks-inspired mystery text adventure that combines the best elements of classic interactive fiction, visual novels, and gamebooks.

name: Luke Sidewalker
short_description: In a city that never sleeps, one man has a lot of places to be. Meet Luke, a perfectly average and mild mannered man living in New York City. Help him hurry his way down the sidewalks of New York City, through 7 neighborhoods including Time Square, LES, and Central Park.

name: Super Gear Quest
short_description: Follow a young Kewtian called Starter as he barrels through tons of boss fights, explores colorful environments, and meets strange characters in this action-packed Metroidvania adventure!

name: Breaking Wheel
short_description: Breaking Wheel is a sidescrolling 3D platformer. You control a wheel and have to collect as much coffee and coins as you can in more than 50 unique levels with a plethora of interesting gameplay mechanics.

name: Redemption Cemetery: Bitter Frost Collector's Edition
short_description: Stop the bitter Spirit of Cold from killing your ancestors!

name: Hunting Unlimited 4
short_description: Hunting Unlimited 4 combines traditional hunting game elements with a fast-paced mission-based system, for intense hunting action.

name: Hunting Unlimited 2011
short_description: Hunt your way across the 50 great states in three exciting challenge modes – breath in the fresh air!

name: Hunting Unlimited 2009
short_description: Hunt your way across North America's most breathtaking environments!

name: Wild Animals - Animated Jigsaws
short_description: "Animated Jigsaws" is a jigsaw puzzle game with videos instead of pictures. "Wild Animals - Animated Jigsaws" contains moving images of lion,tiger,elephant,giraffe,gorilla,zebra,koala,kangaroo,giant panda and surprised king penguin colony.

name: Voodoo Vince: Remastered
short_description: The classic character platformer is back after 13 years and newly remastered! Help Vince run, jump and fight his way through cemeteries, swamps and an evil carnival as he seeks to save his creator Madam Charmaine from the clutches of Kosmo The Inscrutable.

name: Fatal Gem VR(The First Match-3 VR Game)
short_description: Fatal Gem is the first match-3 VR game and during the game, evil aliens trap the player whose left hand is tied to a time bomb so the player should try to match the gems with the mattock. Keep working and try not to be blown up. Good luck, poor miner!

name: Ancient Code VR( The Fantasy Egypt Journey)
short_description: Ancient Code is an innovative game and it includes 4 high-quality mini-games which are called Grenadier, Archery, Shooting, and Mix level design. Please join in and start the Fantasy Journey of Egypt!

name: Puyo Puyo™Tetris®
short_description: Two puzzle game juggernauts collide as global phenomenon Tetris® and SEGA’s famous Puyo Puyo™ combine in a super mash-up of ferocious competition, adorable looks, and addictive puzzle fun!

name: Flower Design
short_description: A flower arrangement sandbox game. The shapes and colors are freely adjustable and there is a garden where you can build a house and put flowers in.

name: Coffin of Ashes
short_description: Delilah is an ordinary school girl who accidentally discovers an old mansion on a rainy night. As her exploration in the mansion continues, she finds many mysterious phenomena that can't be explained. In this mansion covered by ashes, what's the secret hidden deep underground?

name: Trip to Vinelands
short_description: Trip to Vinelands is an arcade retro hardcore maze wanderer minigame.

name: BOTOLO
short_description: BOTOLO is a hybrid game of keepaway and king-of-the-hill. BOTOLO is a fast paced mindreading competition. BOTOLO is a dance inside the negative space between your opponent's thoughts.

name: 画境(Picturesque) VR
short_description: Enter the world of "Picturesque", and experience an imaginative and heartfelt adventure game with puzzle-solving features, based on HTC Vive. Get ready to witness a world filled with natural beauty and reminiscent scenes, embarks on a larger than life journey, and re-collect the lost memories.

name: Pursuit of Power® 2 : The Chaos Dimension
short_description: Pursuit of Power® 2 : The Chaos Dimension is a fast-paced real-time strategy game with pixel art. You assume the role of a powerful Shadow Knight, Stalker, or Mage. Upgrade abilities. Dynamic world events. Manage fortresses. Campaign and skirmish (local or network).

name: Primordian
short_description: These are the last days of the first planet, experience a vast ancient world and civilization as you travel through the twisting story mode. Strange and unique weapons, creatures and characters from the dawn of time and beyond.

name: Ladybug Quest
short_description: Ladybug Quest is an EXTREMELY challenging, tile-based, action-platformer that plunges you into an adventure following the quest of a Ladybug trying to save her colony! Hop and dodge your way through the enchanting environments, while immersing yourself in the riveting story.

name: Gem Forge
short_description: An addictive puzzle game where you need to move and merge gems of the same type. The game is similar to the games like Threes! and 2048, except there is no numbers here, but gemstones.

name: Starry Nights : Helix
short_description: The retro-style Side Scroller shooting game with vivid storyline depicts fully charactered protagonists love affairs.! Colorfully themed game stages and variety of bosses infests here!

name: Gnomes Garden 3: The thief of castles
short_description: Gnomes Garden 3 — a new chapter in this exciting fantasy/strategy game. Head off into unknown lands and defeat the warlock!

name: Unforgiven VR
short_description: Conquer the west by becoming the best duelist ever. Unforgiven brings you the thrill and tension of a true western VR duel. Face another player in an experience where a split second can decide who lives and who dies. Thrive in the ruthless social world of Unforgiven and become a true legend.

name: Red Comrades 3: Return of Alaska. Reloaded
short_description: In order to save the world once again Pete and Vasily Ivanovich will have to get through fire, water and through… some other stuff and then again and again. They will get really close to the worst criminals on Las-Vegas streets, enlist in the commandos and complete several missions for the USA government - to get rid of drug dealer's...

name: Xenus 2. White gold.
short_description: Caribbean islands; islands full of secrets, mystery and the spirit of romance. These islands are both beautiful and lethally dangerous. Centuries ago the waters of this region were teeming with pirates and adventurers... and frankly, not much has changed since then.

name: The Journey
short_description: The Journey is a VR experience classified as a scientific, educational and adventure game which is based on the exploration of the human body.

name: SPACE MOUSE 35th Anniversary edition
short_description: Guide Alice, cat astronaut extraordinaire, to the top of the building without being caught by the vicious Space Mice. The original version of this vertically-scrolling maze game was released in September 1981 for the PC-8001. It was designed by Takanari Suzuki, Japan’s first star game creator.

name: Dynamic Very, Very, Hard game!!
short_description: Dynamic is an indie Platformer game. The goal is to try to avoid obstacles and dangerous enemies who want to kill you

name: Craft Keep VR
short_description: Set within a fantasy world of dragons, dungeons and foul-mouthed customers, you are an alchemist-blacksmith forging weapons and brewing potions.

name: Brief Karate Foolish
short_description: Here comes a new epic of live action fighting game!! With 60fps smooth action, sexy and deadly guys fly into air and bounces their flab!

name: Cavern Escape Extremely Hard game!!!
short_description: Cavern escape is new platformer puzzle game.

name: Grab the Bottle
short_description: Grab the Bottle is a puzzle game in which you solve puzzles by stretching an infinitely stretchy arm through various levels, grabbing and dropping objects along the way.

name: Pathway
short_description: Explore the strange unknown with Pathway, a strategy adventure set in the 1930s great wilderness. Unravel long-forgotten mysteries of the occult, raid ancient tombs and outwit your foes in turn-based squad combat!

name: Sluggish Morss: Days of the Purple Sun
short_description: A local multiplayer brawler.

name: Baezult 2
short_description: Baezult 2 is a puzzle platformer that takes place around the ancient temples of Baezult, lost for generations but rediscovered, hidden behind the waterfalls of a reclusive jungle island. It's a single player game and the sequel to Baezult.

name: Heart and Seoul
short_description: Kim Yoon-Ji has a fantastic opportunity come up during her spring break; her affluent architect uncle has a business trip to New York and has asked her to housesit his luxury Seoul apartment for him. Comedy and romance ensues as she moves to Seoul for this time period and meets an interesting set of locals who proceed to show her around!

name: Tank it!
short_description: In Tank it! you command a drone to remotely control a heavy tank. You receive the mission to travel to remote villages, find and destroy the target military camps and eliminate all terrorists. But as in real life, there are many civilians in the villages, as well. The terrorists and civilians alike are at the player’s mercy.

name: Snowball!
short_description: . . .. ... ......A homegrown, hand-cranked winter pinball adventure. Send your behemoth snow spheres through a bobsled maze of snowbanks, homemade wooden paddles, Tesla coils, igloos, railcars and more... ... .. . .

name: Half-Life: Alyx
short_description: Half-Life: Alyx is Valve’s VR return to the Half-Life series. It’s the story of an impossible fight against a vicious alien race known as the Combine, set between the events of Half-Life and Half-Life 2. Playing as Alyx Vance, you are humanity’s only chance for survival.

name: Vanguards
short_description: In this fast-paced 3 vs. 3 MOBA-styled battle, hero knights use elemental powers to gain control over a ghost that can be placed on enemy bases to lower these bases' shields and drain them of their energy.

name: Acro Storm
short_description: Prepare to undertake a journey that's a bit more than it seems in the futuristic, interstellar world of competitive airbike racing! As you scream around tracks and dodge dangerous weaponry, always remember; in a competitor's life, there's always more than a prize at stake...

name: Beat Boxer
short_description: Exercise to your own music! Punch, dodge, and dance around the ring. BeatBoxer is a Room-Scale VR boxing game that puts you in the spotlight of your own boxing match. Play any song from Youtube or use Airplay to play a continuous stream of music from Spotify, Pandora, iTunes, or your favorite music app.

name: Operation Breakout
short_description: A fantastic FPS to play together with your friends or alone.Go into the savage world of Operation Breakout and get yourself to the top!A great game without Pay2Win!

name: Xark
short_description: ** Currently only supports the Vive ** ** Currently in early access / alpha testing ** Delve deep into hidden dungeons. Explore, fight, find, level up.

name: The Butterfly Sign
short_description: The Butterfly Sign is a detective story putting players into the role of the survivor of a disastrous incident. The protagonist takes an experimental drug which immerses him in the depths of his mind. In his memories, he will discover the ones responsible for the disaster, little by little, step by step…

name: Anomalies
short_description: Are you looking for something completely different? An oddity? An enigma? Or perhaps .. an Anomaly? Anomalies may be a game, then again it may not. One user described it as "A million musical leeches, waiting to suck the serotonin from my brain." And that's just the beginning...

name: Comit the Astrodian
short_description: Platformer based on a 22 year old blueprint. Help Comit boost his was through several planets in an attempt to stop the evil space pirate Krater from taking over the Star System.

name: Tower in the Sky : Tactics Edition
short_description: Lead a team of unlikely heroes into battle against an ancient enemy ... and save the Kingdom! Explore a magical world and conquer evil – collecting loot, mystical items, and even designer T-shirts along the way! Can you unravel the truth about the Tower in the Sky?

name: Pony World 2
short_description: A sequel to the very successful Pony World now in 3D. Improved gameplay, cartoony graphics and a whole new Pony Town to explore, live in and form relationships.

name: Merchants & Mercenaries
short_description: Merchants and Mercenaries is a hectic real-time strategy that looks and feels like the board games you love, with none of the waiting. There’s no one way to play, or even to win, but you’d better be fast!

name: Fear Effect Sedna
short_description: Thrilling action and stealth gameplay enhanced by the Fear system, an exciting story and ultra-stylish cutscenes. Harness your team’s dynamic abilities to tackle enemies and puzzles like never before.

name: Machine Hunt
short_description: Machine Hunt is a first person, fast paced, chaotic shooting game that pits heavily armed players against machines that have only one goal, destroy humanity.

name: Happy Empire 2 – The Lost Relic
short_description: Find mysterious relics inside an ancient chamber and progress through the Empire by using the power of those relics. Unite the Empire! Defeat the Evil Wizard and return home victorious!

name: Mechatroniks Attack
short_description: Mechatroniks Attack is an amateur very difficult action game. Try the Demo version to check if you like it and if your computer work with it.

name: Midnight Carnival
short_description: Midnight Carnival is a Visual Novel with a dark and disturbing story and theme.

name: Town of Night
short_description: Town of Night is a RPG-First-person dungeon crawler hybrid. Visit the town that sits atop a series of vast and dangerous dungeons. Explore, battle, loot and survive!

name: Septic Savages
short_description: After encountering an alien creature in a bathroom stall, one man is propelled into a never-ending quest of sewer dwelling carnage! Septic Savages is a 2D, 1 or 2-player, twin-stick shooting roguelike with loads of randomized elements and hours upon hours of gameplay.

name: Above - VR
short_description: Above is a virtual experience that place the player in the position of a stranded astronaut in space. Join the main character in a visually stunning experience during the last minutes of his life.

name: RYB
short_description: RYB is a logic puzzle game that plays like a combination of sudoku and minesweeper.

name: Halloween Mysteries
short_description: Dive into the fantastic world of magic and mysteries. In the world full of wonders, unusual creatures, witches and demons. In the world where something which you have not yet encountered awaits you in every corner.

name: The Hero
short_description: "The Hero" is an open world action adventure game . The story takes place in two cities in two different ages with two different playable characters. The first is : Newyork (USA) in an imaginary gloomy way and the second story: London (United kingdom) in 1802 at the Fraser campaign on Egypt.

name: Owari
short_description: Owari is a variant of Mancala where players strategically attempt to capture stones from their opponent's row.

name: The Morgue Fissure Between Worlds
short_description: Descend into darkness... The Morgue Fissure Between Worlds, provides a dark mysterious environment that is waiting to be discovered. Your world is connected with many others. There are things that must be forgotten, relics that must be discovered, and worlds to be charted....

name: Zukara
short_description: A Singleplayer tactical Sci-fi FPS game located on a hostile jungle planet.

name: Boo Breakers: The Ghostening
short_description: Inspired by Ghostbusters and Harry Potter, take on the role of a powerful mage in this whimsical Halloween themed VR game. Use the power of dual wands to capture mischievous spirits and defeat powerful bosses.

name: Sullen
short_description: Sullen is a fast-paced, challenging platformer set inside of a circle. Your ultimate goal is to work through all of the levels and defeat the sullen eye that relentlessly attacks you. You assume control of a small pentagon and must dodge, jump, and shoot your way to victory.

name: Oscar Mike VR
short_description: Oscar Mike VR is a fast paced 5-on-5 FPS game for the Vive. Players can play as the International Special Forces or the Fifth Column. OM:VR features realistic maps and weapons that make the players feel immersed in the action.

name: Mausoleum of the Medusa
short_description: 'Medusa' is a love song to brutal, old-school arena combat. Perseus and Medusa are trapped in a deathmatch--but the gods raise them from the dead! Prove yourself with first blood, then compete for the top spot on the Steam leaderboard!

name: Calcflow
short_description: Manipulate vectors with your hands, explore vector addition and cross product. See and feel a double integral of a sinusoidal graph in 3D, a mobius strip and it's normal, and spherical coordinates! Create your own parametrized function and vector field!

name: That's Mahjong!
short_description: That's Mahjong! is a Solitaire Mahjong tile matching game, where the purpose is to match tiles of the same type, or any two season tiles. How much karma can you gather?

name: LoveKami -Divinity Stage-
short_description: MoeNovel's exciting new original title, LoveKami -Divinity Stage-, debuts on Steam in English, bringing a fun and energetic tale filled with magic and music!

name: BREAK ARTS II
short_description: Faster than anyone. Stronger than anyone. And more stunning. Customize your robot for “cyber battle racing” in a game that offers all the thrills of racing, battle, and customization. Online, Offline, Time-Attack... which mode will you dominate?!

name: Dark War
short_description: Dark War - New fantasy MMORPG! New free online fantasy MMORPG Dark War is coming! Let's have a quick look. After downloading the mini client in short time, you can then start right into the game. From the first minute you're trapped in a compelling storyline and have to fight against various creatures of the underworld to move forward.

name: Mosaic: Game of Gods
short_description: Mosaic: Game of Gods is a game of mosaic puzzles made of different materials. The Universe exists balancing between Chaos and Creation. They bring harmony and equilibrium; they are watching the flow of life. But, when one of the forces prevails, the world becomes unrecognizable.

name: Whiplash - Crash Valley
short_description: Whiplash - Crash Valley. Super-premium-deluxe interactive Ragdoll simulation system.

name: CAGE
short_description: With lightning-fast gameplay fully exploiting all three dimensions of motion, CAGE is a shooter unlike any other. The "tether" allows for unprecedented freedom and agility of movement, creating explosive action.

name: Willie's Haunted Hayride
short_description: A haunted hayride that can only be experienced in virtual reality!

name: Hade
short_description: Hade is a minimalist logic game with severely difficult puzzles softened by relaxing ambient music.

name: Goblin.Life
short_description: IMAGINATION WITH FRIENDS Forge playable 3D worlds in real time, script them with astral Glyphs, and fill them with adorable Goblins.

name: peakvox Mew Mew Chamber for Steam
short_description: Let's slide lovely cats in the crowd! They disappear when line up 3-same kinds of cats and the others get the crowded out of the field! It's the deceptive simplicity and how KAWAII (very sweet) new challenging puzzle! This game is compatible with the network ranking. Let's try to compete with the world users!

name: peakvox Route Candle for Steam
short_description: Let's light a candle... it's the beginning of Sparky's great adventure! The Sparky's battlefield is the only 6 x 12 square lattices. Make an efficient route for Sparky in this new challenging puzzle.

name: Invaders!
short_description: Retro Space Invaders comes to VR! This game offers you an exciting and nostalgic experience with its 8-bit style and action-filled levels.

name: Doomsday Survival:Training
short_description: "Doomsday Survival: Training" is a VR somatic game. Players need to make jumps, crouchs and a wide range of moves to escape the deadly laser traps, but also with the same Parkour game to get more scoring props.

name: Fancy Trangram VR
short_description: Tangram is a Chinese intellectual game with a long history.It consists of seven board , Player can use them to constitute a variety of characters, images, animals, bridges, housing, towers, etc.In Fancy Tangram we have prepared more then 40 levels,most of them are numbers and letters.

name: Primitive Road
short_description: Primitive Road is an indie VR shooting game with minimalist design, arcade elements and beautiful graphics. Go through the 9 levels, blow up the pyramids and objects in your path and reach the final.

name: Tayutama 2-you're the only one-
short_description: Introduction In the mountain town far away the ashihara chou，a BRAND-NEW story about the coexistence of “humans”and “ tayutai“ is about to start. To be with you    this is the only oath   and my everything

name: Soldier Sortie :VR Agent 006
short_description: Soldier Sortie:VR Agent 006 is a shooting adventure game developed with HTC VIVE. The game will bring you exciting experience of VR technology. Breaking through the virtuality and reality, experience the intense gunfight and puzzle adventure in the virtual world.

name: Anguished
short_description: Run from the darkness as you confront yourself with the demons that hunt you in a retro rpg style.

name: Happy Birthday, Bernard
short_description: Grow trees to climb up the floating islands back to your home, armed only with a watering can. Careful thought must be used to know where and when to plant and grow the trees. They require sunlight on their leaves and water on their roots to grow.

name: Danger Room
short_description: Survive the holographic barrage of turrets in the Danger Room on the HTC Vive. Slow time, dodge lasers, suck bullets and fire them back at enemies!

name: Unhappy Ever After
short_description: 'In the infinitesimal spaces between the pages of every book lies an unseen universe: smaller perhaps than ours but filled with all the wonders, and horrors, conceivable by the human mind' --- A dark-themed, fantasy, coming of age, RPG, which parodies the classic fairytales.

name: [ R.U.M.A ]
short_description: Welcome to Random Unstable Matter Acquisition, [R.U.M.A], where YOU have been selected to pioneer our latest technology in deep space resource collection. Of course, you won't be alone, your trusty [R.U.M.A.D] will be on hand to help see you through. Oh, and one last tip, don't forget to not breath!

name: Druid
short_description: Druid is an adventure game with different puzzles and riddles where you play as a druid who searches for a wise master and helps to magic forest dwellers. Overcome all obstacles to find your teacher!

name: Sweep'n'Sweep
short_description: Sweep'n'Sweep is a game similar to Minesweeper, but with one difference: when you fill the whole line, it disappears and a new empty one appears on top. Enjoy the new infinite gameplay and try to clear as many lines as possible!

name: Project Abyss
short_description: Project Abyss is a deep sea adventure game where you explore as a diver, forced to survive a destiny that goes deeper than anyone imagined.

name: The Talos Principle VR
short_description: The Talos Principle VR is a virtual reality version of Croteam's critically acclaimed first-person puzzle game in the tradition of philosophical science fiction.

name: Serious Sam VR: The First Encounter
short_description: Serious Sam VR: The First Encounter is a frantic arcade action FPS, featuring singleplay and co-op campaign, various multiplayer modes, all presented in glorious VR and with different locomotion movements.

name: Serious Sam VR: The Second Encounter
short_description: Serious Sam VR: The Second Encounter is a sequel to Serious Sam VR: The First Encounter - frantic arcade action FPS, featuring singleplay and co-op campaign, various multiplayer modes, all presented in glorious VR and with different locomotion movements.

name: Havoc Runner
short_description: "Havoc Runner" is a futuristic action and 2D platform game that will take you to Titan's moon to face killers robots, missile launchers, and automated weapons in a hostile environment where you must find and destroy the Tupan computer, preventing a missile attack on the planets of the solar system.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
short_description: The critically acclaimed Vermintide 2 is a visually stunning and groundbreaking melee action game pushing the boundaries of the first person co-op genre. Join the fight now!

name: Far Cry® 5
short_description: Discover the open world of Hope County, Montana, besieged by a fanatical doomsday cult. Dive into the action solo or two-player co-op in the story campaign, use a vast arsenal of weapons and allies, and free Hope County from Joseph Seed and his cult.

name: Lotia®
short_description: Dreamer Reef O’Meara and his crew on the Surprise journey across Lotia, trying to avoid entanglements with the dreaded Dominion who rule the seas.  The nature of their latest enterprise embroils them in a desperate conflict, one whose outcome will determine the fate of all who dwell in Lotia.

name: Space Rift NON-VR - Episode 1
short_description: Be part of the action! SPACE RIFT is the first part of a breathtaking action space adventure with a captivating story!Originally developed for virtual reality, this version has been optimized for non-VR gaming fun without a VR headset.Join the fight for the freedom of humanity on Mars!

name: The New Queen
short_description: The kingdom is on a bad situation, as followers of the rebellion attack, steal, and hurt what Lorelai loves the most: the people of Uboro. The queen must find a solution, and for this she depends upon three friends: Victoria, Alkor and Celine.

name: Jade's Journey
short_description: Join Jade in her journey to master her powers and save her father! Jade is a regular girl living in a regular village until one day... it all changes.

name: The Sexy Brutale
short_description: The Sexy Brutale — a never-ending masked ball featuring intrigue, murder and the (quite possibly) occult! Relive the same mysterious day where the guests at the casino mansion are being murdered by the staff over and over again...

name: Ninja Smasher!
short_description: Ninja　dash! Ninja jump! Ninja slash! 8-bit style Ninja platform action game!

name: ATOM RPG: Post-apocalyptic indie game
short_description: ATOM RPG is a post-apocalyptic indie game, inspired by classic CRPGs: Fallout, Wasteland, Deus Ex, Baldur's Gate and many others.

name: Keep Watching VR
short_description: Keep Watching is a virtual reality horror game. The goal is simple. Escape. You'll need to keep watching though, they move when your back is turned.

name: Rite of Passage: The Perfect Show Collector's Edition
short_description: After your student goes missing alongside several other children, it is up to you to solve the mystery of Everlake.

name: Fantasy Fairways
short_description: What if you had to get a hole-in-one on every hole? Fantasy Fairways is a golf game where you design your own path to the hole. Bounce the ball off trampolines, zoom through different power ups, even take it through wormholes -- several gizmos let you express yourself. The game is all about balancing your own creativity and skill.

name: WORLD OF FINAL FANTASY®
short_description: CAPTURE, CUSTOMISE AND EVOLVE! Embark on a magical journey with siblings Reynn and Lann as they explore the vast land of Grymoire to rediscover their past and save the future.

name: Saga of the North Wind
short_description: The gods chose you to lead your tribe on a deadly pilgrimage to the North! When future generations recite your saga, will they sing of glory or downfall?

name: Speech Trainer
short_description: Speech Trainer is a virtual auditorium where you can learn to overcome your fear of public speaking by addressing a virtual audience.

name: Dexodonex
short_description: Hexagonal puzzle with the ability to edit levels

name: Swingin Swiggins
short_description: Swingin Swiggins is a side-scrolling platformer that will take you on an adventure through many exotic locations. The game focuses on swinging but you must be careful that you don't run out of stamina or you can fall off the rope mid swing.

name: aMAZEing adventures
short_description: aMAZEing adventures is addictive game for VR where your goal is to guide your ball through many varied mazes specially designed for each level. Using your motion controllers you have to hold the maze in your hands and tilt the maze to keep your ball moving but also at the same time to avoid many threats inside.

name: STARDROP
short_description: STARDROP is an interactive sci-fi cinematic experience.

name: Fields XY
short_description: Introducing Fields XY a puzzle platformer featuring 3 unique characters, all interacting at once to complete levels both simple and complex.

name: Tokyo Tattoo Girls
short_description: Develop your companion's skills by giving her powerful tattoos and battle the Syndicate to escape the city in Tokyo Tattoo Girls!

name: Snakes - N - Ladders : Origins - Episode 1
short_description: Every ancient game has a story behind its origins. Scripted from an exciting Sci-Fi perspective, this is a story of how the ancient Snakes&Ladders board game came to be. Snakes-N-Ladders: Origins - Episode 1 is a small, fun, tense, and entertaining shooter game.

name: Fastigium
short_description: Grab whatever you can find,kill whoever you can see. Clenching your weapon and light could help you survive in the waste subway station in Tokyo. Immerse your soul in the darkness,and good luck...…

name: Sumoman
short_description: Sumoman is an adventure puzzle platformer with advanced physics, destructible objects and the ability to reverse time. Solve various physical puzzles, trying to keep the unstable Sumoman on his feet in challenging environments.

name: World of Warships
short_description: Immerse yourself in thrilling naval battles and assemble an armada of over 600 ships from the first half of the 20th century — from stealthy destroyers to gigantic battleships. Change the look of your ship, choose upgrades to suit your play style, and go into battle with other players!

name: Escape Artist: The Trial
short_description: Escape Artist: The Trial enables you to find your inner escape artist! Combining the best parts of a real life room escape experience into Virtual Reality, Escape Artist: The Trial goes even further: break things to make things!

name: Theatre of Doom
short_description: Theatre of Doom is an intense and fast top-down action game. Fight your way through the hellish stages against demonic marionette puppets, and ferocious monsters.

name: Welcome Home, Love
short_description: What lies in store for Jess? Experience her world and find the secret buried at the end. Welcome Home, Love is a narrative-driven VR experience with hundreds of interactable items, and fully voiced dialogue for all characters and pickups.

name: Timber! The Logging Experts
short_description: Finally - a light-weight forestry simulation that doesn’t need hours of tutorials to learn the basics. Easy to learn, hard to master is the key. Jump into your sophisticated machinery, get work done and enjoy the career mode.

name: Alpine Ski VR
short_description: Alpine Ski VR by Suchworks Studios brings the thrill of skiing to your desktop. There are three different game types: Slalom, Freestyle and Heliski. Beat the splits on the 6 slalom levels, pull some tricks on the 6 freestyle levels, or cruise around the 100km2 offpiste; complete with your own helicopter!

name: Into The Unknown
short_description: There's nothing scarier than waking up in the middle of the forest alone... or so it seems. Taking control of Rachel in this short, story driven, exploration game, you must find out where you are, why you're there, and most importantly, how to get out. What will you uncover when you delve into the unknown?

name: Green Mirror
short_description: Following the disappearance of a family while hiking in the forests, Dylan Riley, a veteran member of the search and rescue unit, suffers an accident that leaves him alone and lost in the middle of the night. But... Is he really alone?

name: VR Dungeon
short_description: VR Dungeon is a cross-reality two player local co-op game, using the HTC Vive and a smartphone. Solve puzzles together to find treasure and escape the dungeon!

name: Realpolitiks
short_description: Become the leader of any contemporary country in this streamlined real-time grand strategy game. Use diplomacy, espionage, military and economic power to deal with other nations, while tackling issues such as terrorism, financial crises and medical epidemics, all in an effort to achieve global domination!

name: Drift King: Survival
short_description: The first racing survival game with an absolutely unbelievable atmosphere! Test yourself in three complicated drifting modes. Tune your car as nobody else to survive on the track. Taste the freedom of drift in super freestyle mode. Get up to the top in ranking and prove that you are the DriftKing!

name: Lethal League Blaze
short_description: Banging beats and mad style, Lethal League Blaze is the most intense ball game you can play online with up to 4 players.

name: SYREN
short_description: SYREN is an intense survival horror game in which you must use your wits to navigate through a labyrinthine underwater base. In episode 1, you must use stealth, and solve puzzles to survive, while in episode 2, you must blast your way through the deadly swarm of syrens stalking you.

name: Clutter 7: Infinity, Joe's Ultimate Quest
short_description: This just might be the best Clutter of them all

name: SolarGun
short_description: Discover SolarGun, a first-person puzzle game set in a aseptic factory. Use energy orbs, dodge lasers, and activate mechanisms to escape. With over 20 puzzles, hidden minigames, and a speedrun mode, every decision counts on your path to freedom.

name: Space Ghost Pirate Zombie Slayer
short_description: Is there intelligent life in the universe? Of course not, it's filled with Zombies! Sensing the opportunity for plunder, the Ghost Pirates have taken to the stars on their ethereal ships. Now it is up to YOU to take command of the Space Ghost Pirate Zombie Slayer fleet and lead them against the Zombie menace!

name: Pirate Defense
short_description: Pirate Defense eschews the traditional tower defense model by letting you get as close as to the action as you dare. Each map features multiple branching pathways which are designed to reward players who make strategic choices in their tower placement and choice.

name: TUNIC
short_description: Explore a land filled with lost legends, ancient powers, and ferocious monsters in TUNIC, an isometric action game about a small fox on a big adventure.

name: Skill Master VR -- Learn Meditation
short_description: Skill Master VR -- Learn Meditation is the first meditation app that allows you to learn meditation in VR by visualizing your breath in real time.

name: R.A.T.S. (Regulatory Astro-Topographical Stabilizer)
short_description: R.A.T.S. is a fast-paced 3D arcade shooter where the battlefield is anything but stable! Pilot a ship on the surface of a star that is on the verge of going supernova while defending against swarms of enemies in this stellar shooter!

name: The Purge Day
short_description: The Purge Day is the first person narrative, immersive horror shooter designed exclusively for VR. Choose your weapon and fight against alien swarm in Asian agglomeration.

name: Destination Ares
short_description: You're the AI of a rickety colony ship, bound for the red planet. You have limited resources, a desperate crew, and an unknown fate awaiting you. Can you survive the journey across the Big Black?

name: The Pirate's Fate
short_description: Embark on a swashbuckling adventure in The Pirate's Fate, a visual novel experience with a unique twist: the story, the crew, and who you are transform based on your choices. Seek treasure, find love, and choose your fate.

name: Wild Game Hunter VR
short_description: Grab your rifle, get outdoors, and bag some wild game! In this immersive virtual reality hunting experience, you'll get only a few chances for the perfect shot. Dropped into a 360 degree woodland, you're surrounded by critters & nature while you play through multiple levels hunting for *wild game*!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019
short_description: Much more than just a train driving simulator. Build, drive and operate the railroad of your dreams with Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019.

name: Teratini VR
short_description: In this VR adventure, you are the Dragon Mage who glides through the air, smashes attacks back at opponents, and beckons a dragon when the going gets rough. Invent new moves and perfect them in the Sanctuary before taking back Teratini.

name: Phantom Brigade
short_description: Phantom Brigade is a hybrid turn-based & real-time tactical RPG with an innovative timeline-based command system. See the future, predict enemy actions, and plot your counterattack on the timeline! Outnumbered and out-gunned, lead the Brigade's campaign to retake their war-torn homeland.

name: iFactor
short_description: iFactor is an excellent way to have some challenging, strategic fun while practicing multiplication.

name: Hot Squat
short_description: Welcome to Flynn Fitness, home of the Hot Squat. Prepare to undergo a rigorous test to not only your legs, but also your will to do as many squats as you possibly can. Compete against your friends, yourself, and the world to get the highest squat count.

name: ArsonVille
short_description: A calming, relaxing, yet slightly disturbing casual game in which you attempt to completely burn down a village.

name: Wipe Out VR
short_description: Q-style VR tower defense strategy game. By simulating the true feeling of archery, you can choose single person mode or multiple cooperation mode to guard your castle.

name: ICEY
short_description: ICEY is a 2D side-scrolling action game and a META game in disguise. As you follow the narrator's omnipresent voice, you will see through ICEY's eyes and learn the truth about her world. The narrator will constantly urge you in one direction, but you must ask, "Why? Why am I following his directions?“ Obey? Rebel?

name: Hand Eye Cubination
short_description: Are you after a new VR experience?Come try Hand Eye Cubination!Your job is to guide two cubes through a series of challenging levels with nothing more than your perception of where your flailing limbs are pointing!With no visual clues to assist, you will rely 100% on your human senses to get you through!Check out the store for more info!

name: Dustoff Heli Rescue 2
short_description: In Dustoff Heli Rescue 2 you can: Save hostages being held in Prisoner of War camps. Combat in military attacks in the desert, forests, mines, swamps and fjords.

name: Einlanzer
short_description: Einlanzer is a full-scale, epic fantasy role-playing game. The 40+ hour story of Einlanzer is deep, thought-provoking, and emotional, while remaining light-hearted and fun at times. Expect a strategic battle system, massive scope, regularly added content, and difficult moral decisions.

name: ARK BOX Unlimited
short_description: Create, share and download unlimited new Stages for this new arcade remix with integrated Stage editor!

name: Once in Yaissor
short_description: Summer, 2020, Ya'issor. Most people have become youtubers, streamers, and other scum, and almost no one wants to be a working bum. Nobody has an opinion of their own. Everyone thinks they are nihilists, atheists, reading intellectuals, and other elites.

name: Lunar Stone - Origin of Blood
short_description: Lunar Stone is an exclusively designed first-person shooting story in VR. Unique dodging system strengthens combat against the dark force creatures. The magical stones will lead you on a magnificent adventure. With the help of your beloved companions you will find the answers.

name: DeathMetal
short_description: Not your average brick-breaker arcade game! Prepare for hardcore action, atmospheric metal guitar riffs and old-school arkanoid difficulty. 40 challenging levels in 4 episode sets. Real-time physics and effects. 11 different power-ups to spice up the gameplay. 21 Achievements, 6 Trading Cards. Casual price.

name: 100 nya
short_description: The game develops logical thinking. Taught to think through the moves in advance.

name: HELLDIVERS™ 2
short_description: The Galaxy’s Last Line of Offence. Enlist in the Helldivers and join the fight for freedom across a hostile galaxy in a fast, frantic, and ferocious third-person shooter.

name: Mystic Defense
short_description: Take control as a mage and unleash the four elements of Fire, Ice, Lightning and Earth to defend against the legions of waves and bosses aimed to destroy your castle. Do you have what it takes to defend the human race?

name: Bartigo
short_description: Bartigo is a Online-Party-Game in which you can visit different bars with up to 9 friends. Play countless games, experience witty activities or enjoy the evening with unique entertainment options.

name: GRIDD: Retroenhanced
short_description: GRIDD: Retroenhanced is an intense arcade-style cyberpunk hacking shoot 'em up with an incredible soundtrack, procedurally generated elements, and electric visuals.

name: Husk
short_description: Husk is a purebred FPP horror inspired by the most classical representatives of the genre. Discover Shivercliff - a daunting town where you uncover the ominous and tantalizing plot. Face the worst nightmares, solve mysteries and survive the devouring darkness in order to find your family.

name: Cannonfire Concerto
short_description: In an 18th century symphony of intrigue, your supernatural virtuoso performance begins an overture to war! Spies, lovers, generals…who holds the strings?

name: Stories Untold
short_description: Stories Untold is a compilation tape of four experimental adventures, including a remaster of the original hit episode “The House Abandon”.

name: The Night Christmas Ended
short_description: Team up with the world’s biggest goblin on his quest for gold and be a total Christmas bastard.

name: Fibrillation HD
short_description: Immerse yourself in an adaptation of an old story about Ewan Berrington.

name: Crossroad Mysteries: The Broken Deal
short_description: Anna goes to the places of her childhood. She hopes to get cured from strange disease. This is the last chance to find out the cause of her misery. Whether she ever recover and at what price?

name: Star Kingdom - The Elements
short_description: This is a virtual meditation of self-exploration in the Temple of the Stars into zodiac signs with a fun toss game. Enter a birth date to reactivate planets and discover how the zodiac constellations empower your daily life.

name: it's always monday
short_description: it's always monday - is a first person exploration game

name: The Agency of Anomalies: Cinderstone Orphanage Collector's Edition
short_description: Save the souls of prodigy children and their caretaker who disappeared during the fire in The Agency of Anomalies: Cinderstone Orphanage!

name: KYOTO TANOJI QUEST
short_description: "KYOTO TANOJI QUEST" is a role-playing game set in the "Tanoji area" in Kyoto city. Your goal is to enjoy the trip at 12 shopping streets! The player himself becomes the main character of this game, aiming at a high score while enjoying conversation with people and overcoming the fight with myself.

name: Tribal Siege
short_description: Tribal Siege is a hybrid RTS/ACT game in MOBA-like rules.

name: CRAFT: Work VR Shop
short_description: We are working on a VR workshop which is connected to the physical fabrication factories. Currently we are able to produce the real object out from your making on woodturning lathe in CRAFT.

name: Sonya: The Great Adventure
short_description: Dive into the fantastic world of adventure hidden object quest. Sonya: The Great Adventure is a colorful game with animated cut scenes that are professionally voiced over. This is a touching story of the eternal struggle between the light and the dark.

name: Queen's Quest 2: Stories of Forgotten Past
short_description: Conduct an investigation as shapeshifter!

name: Children of Colossus
short_description: Children of Colossus is a VR action game for HTC Vive. The player will challenge 5 different colossus to win the opportunity for human's development. All the player can rely on are one wand and one sword, he must move or squat to dodge the attack of colossus, and take chance to strike back.

name: Club Naughty
short_description: Build a Club Naughty empire! Build your club, manage staff, take care of your customers, complete mini games, unlock achievements, and level up a variety of club owners. Are you Naughty enough to succeed?

name: Opus Magnum
short_description: Opus Magnum is the latest open-ended puzzle game from Zachtronics, the creators of SpaceChem, Infinifactory, and SHENZHEN I/O. Design and build machines that assemble potions, poisons, and more using the alchemical engineer’s most advanced tool: the transmutation engine!

name: Cosmic Sugar VR
short_description: Cosmic Sugar is an elegant, GPU driven simulation space. Vive wands become attractors or repulsors which allow you to craft nebulas. The controls are very simple, but it takes some time to explore all of the possibilities. Thanks to East Forest for the trailer music.

name: Siege Saga
short_description: Siege Saga is the 2D physics puzzle sandbox in which you must protect yourself by building fortifications against your enemies’ projectiles. It’s like Angry Birds but the other way round!

name: Zak McKracken and the Alien Mindbenders
short_description: Space Aliens have built a stupidity machine that's slowly reducing everyone's IQ to single digits. Worse yet, the only person who can stop them is Zak McKracken, reporter for the disreputable National Inquisitor, who dreams up stories about carnivorous cantaloupes and vegetarian vampires.

name: Phantom Doctrine
short_description: The year is 1983. The world teeters on the verge of destruction as the Cold War tightens its icy grip. East or West: trust no one, question everything. The fate of humanity rests in your hands as you pit spy versus spy in tactical Phantom Doctrine.

name: Inner Voices
short_description: Inner Voices is a dark, non-linear adventure game with a pinch of horror, inspired by works of H. P. Lovecraft and E. A. Poe. Find your way through a procedurally generated maze of rooms and solve the mystery of your past.

name: Pinheads Bowling VR
short_description: Pinheads Bowling VR is a fun new way to play the classic game of bowling, with animated pins and sideline attractions that create an altogether unique bowling experience!

name: Royal Detective: The Lord of Statues Collector's Edition
short_description: Save the besieged alpine village of Martlet and rescue its residents from the mysterious living statues in this exciting Hidden Object Adventure game!

name: Ready, Aim, Splat!
short_description: The undead are back and this time they want your virtual vegetables! Well, if they want 'em, give it to them. In the only humane way possible.... A juicy tomato to the face! Ha! Not only that, but pumpkins, watermelons, cats and much more. For the love of all that is ripe. It's time to... Ready, Aim, Splat!

name: Rakuen
short_description: A hospitalized Boy comes to terms with his own story by traveling with his Mom to a beautiful fantasy world; ultimately helping his fellow patients find closure by walking a mile in their shoes.

name: Ghostlight Manor
short_description: Ghostlight Manor is a strategic puzzler with 60 hauntingly challenging levels. Encounter a cast of beloved classic monsters while locating the source of the monster invasion before it’s too late! In multiplayer test your skills against our brand new A.I.

name: Wayward Souls
short_description: Wayward Souls is a randomly generated action-RPG with a heavy focus on story. Play as seven different heroes, all with their own sets of abilities. Fight through steadily greater hordes of enemies.

name: Snailiens
short_description: Introducing Snailiens! The adorably terrifying monsters aimed at stealing all of Earth’s cabbages. In this VR tower defense game, you play as the commander of the S.A.L.T. defense network. In virtual reality you construct towers, equip guns, and fight off the Snailien invaders.

name: Thunder Spheres - Virtual Reality 3D Pool
short_description: The Futuristic 3D Pool game... In a non too distant future advanced in artificial gravity (or lack of it) have provided the platform to an immersive 3D pool game called Thunder Spheres. Set in three zones (Astronauts, Explorers and Circus) the game revolves around your ability to pot floating spheres into pockets in the arena around you.

name: Illyriad - Grand Strategy MMO
short_description: Build a city, Create an Empire! Research 400+ technologies, and Build 70+ buildings, Craft and Trade 380+ items in an entirely player driven market. Fight Wars and Forge Alliances with thousands of players and create your own Empire in this award-winning, critically-acclaimed MMO.

name: A Fisherman's Tale
short_description: Bend and twist reality in A Fisherman's Tale, the mind-bending VR puzzle adventure game in which being turned upside down and inside out is not merely a play on words.

name: EURGAVA™: Fight for Haaria
short_description: EURGAVA™ - Fight for Haaria, a reaction-based combat rpg where you struggle to rebuild your broken village, learn the fate of your home country, and restore its order. Get ready!

name: Brocat: the B Game
short_description: Experimental side-scroller with nostalgic memes. Dynamic strong B game, with Brocat as the main character and bugs that were carefully preserved by Developer.

name: Demented Pixie
short_description: Demented Pixie is a blend between twin-stick shooters and roguelikes with unique visuals and ambientation, packed with content, in which nothing is what it looks like…

name: Love Ribbon
short_description: "Love Ribbon" is a yuri (girl x girl) visual novel about forbidden love between two sisters.

name: Outlaws + A Handful of Missions
short_description: Get ready for the good, the bad, and the even worse. As Marshall James Anderson, you'll face a horde of ornery, gun-slinging outlaws. You'll shoot your way through a twisted plot of greed and revenge. You'll arm yourself with firearms, as well as your wits.

name: Kid Baby: Starchild
short_description: Kid Baby: Starchild is a tight controlling 3D platformer with a focus on twitch based combat and decisive platforming.

name: Betrayal Collection
short_description: This Betrayal pack includes two games: Betrayal at Krondor and Betrayal in Antara.

name: Witch It
short_description: Witch It is a multiplayer hide & seek game set in a vibrant, magical world. Brave hunters seek hidden witches that curse their villages!

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Redemption
short_description: Inhabiting the World of Darkness, you must face a series of brutal confrontations with your nemesis Vukodlak, a powerful vampire lord.

name: Time Tenshi 2: Special Edition
short_description: Join the Time Tenshi as you enter the amazing world of time travel! Your decisions in choices throughout the story will influence which girls you can accompany in any of the in-depth unlockable scenarios, covering everything from visiting new locations in history... to going on a date!

name: PAKO - Car Chase Simulator
short_description: Tough as nails arcade driving game where you try to survive as long as possible without crashing your car in a police chase situation.

name: Gulman 4: Still alive
short_description: Gulman 4: Still alive – is a single-player first-person shooter by Svyatoslav Gulyaev.

name: Terroir
short_description: Terroir is a 3D tile-based tycoon game where you manage your very own vineyard. In Terroir, you grow a variety of different grape varietals, craft your wine, and expand and manage your Chateau, all the while dealing with the weather and events that can either make or break your business.

name: Broken Blue
short_description: Broken Blue is a Puzzle Solving VR Game that utilizes an innovative interface to allow the player to traverse and explore the game’s content. Blue is supposed to be the guardian of a mountain machine and the protector of the monkey monks who dwell there.

name: Causality
short_description: Causality is a puzzle game about manipulating time, changing the sequence of events and altering the outcome of each level.

name: Power Hover
short_description: Take control of the hoverboarding robots, explore the desolate world, defy gravity, dive into the oceans and ride with the sandworms on the dunes! Stylish graphics and groovy soundtrack will take you to an epic adventure in this action/racing game.

name: Shrouded Tales: The Spellbound Land Collector's Edition
