short_description: Puppy Doge VR is a light VR experience where players casually interact with a puppy

name: Distrust: Polar Survival
short_description: DISTRUST is an isometric survival adventure with procedural generation on an Arctic research station lost in the endless dark of a polar night. A story-rich fiction with multiple endings that suits both singleplayer fans and co-op enthusiasts.

name: The Naked Game
short_description: The Naked Game is a first-person psychological thriller/puzzle/exploration game inspired on real events connected by a strong immersive story of a young Eurasian girl who goes on a trip from Japan, her home country, to France.One day she wakes up at an unknown, yet familiar place…

name: Trail of the Damned
short_description: Embark on a treacherous journey, face nightmarish choices, unravel cryptic puzzles, and confront otherworldly horrors in this hellish roguelite. Will you find Salvation or succumb to the madness of Damnation? Hello, cruel world.

name: Eggggg - The platform puker
short_description: Eggggg is a ridiculous two-button platform game where you propel yourself around using your vomiting superpowers.

name: Soldat
short_description: Soldat is a unique 2D (side-view) multiplayer action game. Soldiers fight against each other in 2D battle arenas using a deadly arsenal of military weapons, across 7 default game modes.

name: dotAGE
short_description: Village elder, help us! The Apocalypse is approaching, and we need your guidance to survive. Assign your workers and build a thriving village against the pending doom. DotAGE is the merciless survival roguelite turn-based city builder. Will you fulfill the Prophecy?

name: Professor Teaches Business Planning
short_description: Professor Teaches Business Planning is an easy to use computer training software designed to help you prepare a business plan outline. It will take you from your initial ideas for a business to writing a basic business plan to executing the final business plan.

name: Sword Art Online Re: Hollow Fragment
short_description: Take on the role of Kirito, the hero of the popular Sword Art Online anime series, and explore a fantasy world alongside attractive companions! Take down tough enemies in strategic battles and communicate with your companions in real time!

name: Final Battle
short_description: Final Battle features an enthralling story with many twists and turns, and a gameplay to satisfy the itch of RPG players. It is a must-have for fans of the old Final Fantasy, Dragon Quest and Breath of Fire.

name: The Seeker
short_description: Join four orphans as fate calls upon them for a role greater than they could have ever imagined! Prove yourself worthy of becoming a Seeker and defeat the Unholy Beast hellbent on ruling over those you care for!

name: VR Scape
short_description: VR Scape is a semi-open world RPG aimed for putting you right on the medieval battlefield. Work your way up from a lowly village peasant to one of the mightiest warriors in the land. Fight hordes of Goblins, Orcs, necromancers, and skeletons with magic, sword, or bow and claim your destiny!

name: Animallica
short_description: In Animallica you are racing against extinction after a deadly virus ravaged the world. As the lone survivor of the last conservation center on Earth, the fate of every single animal and plant species lies in your hands.

name: Defenders of the Realm VR
short_description: There is no futuristic weapons and no fancy-shmancy magic powers. In this brutal world, the only power you have is the badass crossbow in your hands and the myriad traps at your disposal. Put your limited resources to good use and repel the barbaric goblin invasion. There are no rules. You have just one mission: destroy them all.

name: BeanVR—The Social VR APP
short_description: BeanVR provides vr social networking and technology application solutions designed to revolutionize existing VR experiences, create next-generation social interactions, create fun, and interesting social platforms.

name: Dal Segno
short_description: Happiness. Paradise. Words that mean as many different things as there are people in this earth. What does happiness mean to you? What shape does your paradise take?

name: Jester's Quest
short_description: ✓ Fairy tale metroidvania with some RPG elements ✓ Hand drawn pixelart with frame by frame animation ✓ Open world map to more than 50+ different levels ✓ Medieval fantasy with magic, quests and dragons ✓ You don't have to read a single line of text              ✓ Combo combat system

name: Yakuza 0
short_description: SEGA’s legendary Japanese series finally comes to PC. Fight like hell through Tokyo and Osaka as junior yakuza Kiryu and Majima. Take a front row seat to 1980s life in Japan in an experience unlike anything else in video gaming, with uncapped framerates and 4K resolutions. A legend is born.

name: UNDYING - "KINGDOM"
short_description: As Anling’s zombie infection sets in, her days are numbered. The struggle to survive is made ever more paramount as she must ensure her son Cody stays alive. She must teach him how to survive in this new world at any cost…

name: Ultrawings
short_description: Ultrawings is an aerial-themed, open-world flight game where you use your virtual hands to fly multiple aircraft to complete a variety of missions across a beautiful, island-themed world!

name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two
short_description: Together with old pals and new comrades alike, Jesse embarks on a brand new journey filled with tough choices, good times, and at least one temperamental llama.

name: Time, Space and Matter
short_description: Time, Space and Matter (TSM) is a first-person action adventure focused on puzzle solving through gravity-manipulation. Find out what happened in an advanced-tech facility prior to your arrival and uncover the existence of a mysterious artificial intelligence.

name: Sankhara
short_description: Saṅkhāra is a poetic VR film inspired by T.S. Eliot's 'Four Quartets'.

name: Throttle Powah VR
short_description: Welcome to a fresh multiplayer, VR, racing, freestyle and Soccer experience. Each VR tracked controller is a mono-wheel motorized rocket. You have freedom to race and perform freestyle jumps and maneuvers in VR using the physics principle of sports like snowboard, skate and motocross.

name: Rival Books of Aster
short_description: Rival Books of Aster is a strategy deck building game that features over 140 hand illustrated spells that you can use to build custom decks and go head to head against other players. Each spell is also a page in a living story book that translates itself and reveals its secrets as you play the game.

name: CodeRed: Agent Sarah's Story - Day one
short_description: Point-and-click adventure game. Together with special agent Sarah Young, follow and catch dangerous terrorist.

name: Operation Warcade VR
short_description: Relive the experience of playing the classic war arcade in a totally amazing way, thanks to virtual reality and the innovative immersion system that will make it possible for you to travel inside the video game.

name: Lander 8009 VR
short_description: The high tech armoured suit VR flight simulator where you flight using the power contained in your gloves

name: Age of Gladiators II: Death League
short_description: Age of Gladiators II: Death League is a single-player strategy game set in the futuristic 3000AD, during the rebirth of the violent and hyper-competitive gladiatorial games. Manage your franchise while forging the attributes and abilities of your warriors. Build your story. Build your empire.

name: Fading
short_description: Traverse the mind of a troubled man in a minimalist 2D adventure.

name: Professor Teaches Accounting Fundamentals
short_description: Professor Teaches Accounting Fundamentals is a user friendly accounting training program with several hours of course instruction developed by experienced accounting professionals. The program is designed with you in mind and will guide you through all the important functions of accounting.

name: VRemedies - CT Procedure Experience
short_description: This project is a Virtual Reality experience designed to introduce child patients and parents to CT procedures before they experience the real world environment. A photo realistic virtual experience in the HTC vive of hospital procedures.

name: Zombie Riot
short_description: ZR is an action packed horror survival game where you must use your wits and surroundings to survive the apocalypse! Purchase a huge array of weapons, from Dual Pistols to a Tesla Assault Rifle! All in your own home, survive the end of the world in this visually stunning VR experience!

name: Original Journey
short_description: Original Journey is a 2D hand drawn, sci-fi action-adventure with a bold hand drawn art style. Join the Ato as they embark on a mission to save their home world. Only a mysterious power source discovered on a distant planet can save them but how far will the Ato go save themselves?

name: Umineko When They Cry - Answer Arcs
short_description: This is the 2nd half of the Umineko When They Cry sound novel series, featuring episodes 5 through 8. This steam version features multi-language options, swap-able renewed character sprites, as well as the original BGMs and un-cut content.

name: Spacescape
short_description: You are trapped on a space station far above the earth. Will you ever get home to earth again?
1982 is a FREE retro inspired blasta-thon that will test your gaming skills to the max.

name: A Bloody Night
short_description: A Bloody Night is a fast action game where the goal is to tear apart all the enemies you encounter in your way. Let yourself be guided by your killing spree and your thirst for revenge. Become the nightmare of your enemies. No one can stop you... Make your way with ferocity through your opponents!

name: Murder In Tehran's Alleys 2016
short_description: This is the story of the time when narcotics impair the brain; the time when a father’s hallucination becomes the dawn of his family’s demise by slicing them into pieces for a sin they have not committed; the time when revenge is the only reason to live.

name: UNTITLED
short_description: Post Code FF: Initializing startup sequence of: UNTITLED. Puzzle course loading… Logic test loading… Discovery test loading… Loading complete. Please contact local administrator to begin the training course.

name: FIELD BREAKING
short_description: Outsmart your opponent and emerge victorious in a thrilling game FIELD BREAKING!

name: Zero Zero Zero Zero
short_description: Navigate past 100 challenging levels to find out if you are the master of 1-bit platforming!

name: Escape The Gray
short_description: Escape the Gray is a VR exclusive room-escape game. Each room’s puzzle is unique. The number of rooms and their order is randomized with each play through.

name: OzGrind Virtual Reality Showroom
short_description: Brick and Mortar is so old school. Let's get digital! Expand your showroom infinitely with a Viewport Virtual Reality Showroom.

name: Forsaken Castle
short_description: Lily is a newly appointed paladin sent to investigate the appearance of undead near a village. Her search leads her to an old castle that is known to have been long abandoned, but signs of life have begun to appear, with lights visible in the distance and drawbridge closed.

name: Soldiers of the Universe
short_description: Soldiers of the Universe is a Story-Driven First Person Shooter game that tells the story of a group of soldiers fighting against terrorist organizations in the Middle-East.

name: Vrifier
short_description: Vrifier is a 3D model & data viewer for extended realities with built-in optimization and export for large models and datasets.

name: Zarya-1: Mystery on the Moon
short_description: Text based quest, mix of Sci-Fi and horror in the veins of Alien and Dead Space.

name: Youropa
short_description: A platform puzzle paint adventure about breaking rules, being upside down and thinking outside the box.

name: Tale of Toast
short_description: With its easy to pick up play style, open world player versus player with high stakes for those daring to partake, and its focus on simple yet tactical combat, social aspects, trade skills, procedurally generated dungeons and quality over quantity quests, it is sure to have something for everyone.

name: Galactic Glitch: Prologue
short_description: Galactic Glitch: Prologue is a stand-alone Action-Roguelike game with physics-based combat mechanics. Fight through bubbles of glitched Spacetime, dodge projectiles, bounce foes off walls and hurl giant rocks in challenging twin-stick combat. Play it for free today!

name: Just One Line
short_description: Just One Line is a fantasy RPG gamebook-like indie game heavily focused on choices and their consequences in which you may compete with other players in an interactive leaderboard. Create different Adventurers and embark on epic quests, unlocking new content for your next playthroughs or create and share your own adventures with the...

name: Kitty Hawk
short_description: Flap your arms to soar through this retro-futuristic VR flying experience.

name: Super Duper Multitasking
short_description: Unlock your hidden potential! Level yourself up and tickle your brain with Super Duper Multitasking!  Using an intuitive control scheme and your amazing gaming skills, this expansion of 2018's Super Multitasking will train you to play up to 3, 4, or even 5 minigames at a time!

name: Run Of Mydan
short_description: Run Of Mydan is a flying VR Shooter set in a breathtakingly beautiful world. It features a Singleplayer/Co-op campaign, and a Multiplayer Arena with up to 10 players.

name: Drive-By Hero
short_description: Inspired by arcade game experiences, Drive By Hero is an apocalyptic shooter game. Shoot enemies, kill bosses, use new weapons and try to survive in this horrific action game. Alone with your car and your gun, you are not the hero they deserve but the one they need.

name: Serious Sam: Tormental
short_description: Serious Sam: Tormental is a 3D rogue-lite top-down shooter where you blast your way through the tormented mind of demigod of destruction Mental, as he imagines worlds and monsters that stand on your path towards his inner ego. Let the showdown begin!

name: UBERMOSH Vol.5
short_description: The fifth volume of the arcade series UBERMOSH.

name: The LEGO® NINJAGO® Movie Video Game
short_description: Find your inner ninja with the all-new LEGO NINJAGO Movie Video Game! Play as your favorite ninjas to defend Ninjago from the evil Lord Garmadon. Master the art of Ninjagility by wall-running and high-jumping, and battle foes to rank up and upgrade the ninja's combat skills.

name: Bleeding Kansas
short_description: This VR game is a first person shooter where you can experience the events in the middle of the 19th century known as Bleeding Kansas.

name: Super Tony Land
short_description: Super Tony Land is a platformer with a powerful level editor and an emphasis on telling stories and building entire game worlds.

name: Narvas
short_description: Take control of Mace in this local co-op side scrolling platform shooter as you travel from assignment to assignment taking on enemy bots and dangerous bosses on different planets.

name: CAD XR
short_description: CAD XR is a visualization tool that allows users to view their CAD models in virtual reality. CAD XR Core provides our standard visualization software and conversion system, capable of optimizing and displaying CAD models of complexity ranging between 5-10 million triangles.

name: Code51:Mecha Arena
short_description: Code51:Mecha Arena is a post-apocalyptic wasteland style mech arena game. As a pilot, you put on your VR headset, sit in the cockpit, drive your giant mech and fight your foes, which are also mechs driven by rival players.

name: Battle Mech Frontier
short_description: Battle Mech Frontier is a turn-based artillery game where two teams face each-other over a fully-destructible terrain and try different strategies to knock each other out until only one side is standing.

name: Skyfront VR
short_description: Skyfront is a fast-paced multiplayer FPS built exclusively for VR. The game launches you into mesmerising zero-G arenas. But not before equipping you with an array of awesome weapons and impressive special abilities.

name: Pathfinder: Kingmaker — Enhanced Plus Edition
short_description: Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Enhanced Plus Edition is the first isometric party-based cRPG set in the Pathfinder fantasy universe. Enjoy a classic RPG experience inspired by games like Baldur's Gate, Fallout 1 and 2 and Arcanum. Explore and conquer the Stolen Lands and make them your kingdom!

name: Gohan Quest
short_description: Gohan Quest is a humorous adventure RPG that takes place in modern Eastern Europe. Play as anime girls, explore the typical russian town, beat the shit out of gopniks and find the missing "children"! Inspired by golden age JRPGs, from fans to fans.

name: Stone Rage
short_description: Stone Rage is a prehistoric, open-world survival game. Play as a Cro-Magnon or Neanderthal and shape-shift into beasts as you secure your place in a harsh landscape of dangerous animals, scarce resources, and unforgiving climates. Make friends and enemies. Build. Fight. Survive.

name: Might & Mayhem
short_description: King Dragon's flames burned away the old realm, and his monsters rule the ashes. But an ember of hope still flickers, waiting for the right hero to rekindle it: You! Might & Mayhem is a turn-based strategy rpg featuring live PvP battles, alliances and epic single-player quests.

name: Blood of Darkness
short_description: Blood of Darkness is a hardcore 2D shooter about a lustful alcoholic priest who was revived by the devil, and this was his biggest mistake!

name: Distant Nightmare - Virtual reality
short_description: Distant Nightmare will immerse you in a dark and mysterious world thanks to VR. The game puts you in the shoes, and on the bike, of a child in a nightmare. Your objective is to cycle through the unexplored environments of your mind in hopes to survive the night and wake up the next day.

name: The Crew™ 2
short_description: Take on the American motorsports scene as you explore and dominate the land, air, and sea across the entire USA. With a wide variety of cars, bikes, boats, and planes, compete in a wide range of driving disciplines.

name: Three Twenty One
short_description: 3:21 is divided into smaller adventure games that open a dialog with the player and encourage interaction and exploration. Through the player's interactions with these that serve as a timeline of events, they discover what 3:21 is really about and just how real games can get.

name: RoBros
short_description: Robros is a robot-themed, action-strategy escort shooter where you control two robots to get them to fight their way out of a factory filled with rogue robots. The gameplay is split in two phases: planning and action. The first phase is planning your escape by plotting a vector path on a 2D map.

name: Riaaf The Spider
short_description: Help the spider Riaaf get his fill!

name: Super Hardcore
short_description: You play for a character of the most popular games - the big red cube. Your task is to collect the coins and to get to the exit avoiding the circular saws.

name: Haunted Halls: Green Hills Sanitarium Collector's Edition
short_description: Explore a decrepit mental asylum and find your missing boyfriend in Haunted Halls – Green Hills Sanitarium!

name: Maestro: Music of Death Collector's Edition
short_description: Stop a mysterious illness that is causing an entire village to rapidly age! Find the cause and find a missing young girl!

name: Pixel Shooter
short_description: In this 2D platformer game, get your gun and shoot all monsters in your way or just run away to the exit.

name: Game of Emperors
short_description: Game of Emperors is MMO strategy known for its deep gameplay. Build your capital, claim new territories by establishing provinces, trading posts and military encampments. Train your army to spy on the enemy and defend your Empire.

name: Near Death Experience
short_description: Near Death Experience is a defensless horror game that puts you in the mind of a car crash victim that lost his memory and finds himself in a threatening and unknown area. The player has to solve riddles to try to regain his memory while running from dark forces.

name: Prime Arena
short_description: Prime Arena is a combination of MOBA and survival gameplay inspired by PUBG. This dynamic deathmatch arena is free of forced socialization and thus of toxic atmosphere found in MOBAs. Victory fully depends on players skill and reaction speed no teammates, no cry!

name: Transference™
short_description: Imagine an escape room set in a deranged mind. Experience a first-person exploration game in a chilling new dimension. Shift between three perspectives of a family and unravel the mystery hiding in this mind-bending psychological thriller.

name: ShockRods
short_description: ShockRods features all the over the top, in your face vehicle combat that you have come to expect from Stainless Games, the world renowned indie studio that specialises in vehicular mayhem.

name: Space Avenger – Empire of Nexx
short_description: Space Avenger is super fast paced top down arena shooter with multiple ships and tons of upgrading options that will help you in your war against the Empire of Nexx. Traverse intense battles across multiple worlds as you attempt to push the Nexx back and save your people!

name: Drone Warfare
short_description: Drone Warfare is an action flight sim and tower defense hybrid shoot-em-up. Research upgrades and deploy your tiny honey bee military drone as you attempt to save the last remaining bees from extinction.

name: Grand Expanse
short_description: Grand Expanse is a VR music video for Martina Sorbara and The Tiny Sun's track “Grand Expanse

name: Airmen
short_description: Airmen is a first person ship building and battling game featuring airships, landships and watercraft. Crew your ship solo or alongside friends on dangerous expeditions into the archipelago to complete contracts, collect resources, and upgrade your ships.

name: Holomeld
short_description: Holomeld is a better way to work remotely. With Holomeld, you’re connected to a shared immersive experience. You can talk things through or sketch on a whiteboard just like you would in person. You can bring up files on your computer and literally point out the issues and come up with solutions.

name: Verto Studio VR
short_description: VertoStudio VR is a fully-capable 3D modeling studio designed to run entirely in VR! You can use it to import FBX, OBJ, DAE (and more) directly in front of you, then configure every aspect of the visual display of these scenes directly down to the individual polygons.

name: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2
short_description: It's about TIME! Join your favorite Super Heroes and Super Villains from different eras and realities as they go head-to-head with the time-traveling Kang the Conqueror in the all-new, original adventure, LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2!

name: Ironclads 2: Caroline Islands War 1885
short_description: Create your fleet and army, hunt the enemy's fleet, hide your weak squadrons in protected ports until reinforcements arrive, blockade enemy trade routes, amphibious assaults and harbour sieges, struggle for dominance over the seas in turned-based strategic mode.

name: Royal Detective: Queen of Shadows Collector's Edition
short_description: After searching for five years, Princess found her mother – only to have her kidnapped right before her eyes!

name: The Agency of Anomalies: The Last Performance Collector's Edition
short_description: Expose a secret brotherhood called The Seekers and save the performers of the theatre who became the brotherhood’s victims.

name: Riddles of Fate: Into Oblivion Collector's Edition
short_description: The seven deadly sins have plunged peaceful Riddlestone into chaos! Rescue the royal family and save their people from destruction.

name: Amaranthine Voyage: The Living Mountain Collector's Edition
short_description: Your strange travels continue in this sequel to the exciting game that took you on an Amaranthine Voyage…

name: Danse Macabre: Crimson Cabaret Collector's Edition
short_description: Tragedy strikes a popular Parisian cabaret when their star dancer is murdered! Gather the suspects and unmask the killer.

name: Shrouded Tales: Revenge of Shadows Collector's Edition
short_description: Adventure into the unknown to save a city from evil!

name: Kitty Nigiri
short_description: The cat in space, sushi catching, laser puzzle solving, fireball dodging, kitten saving, chopstick wielding, flying VR game your cat's been dreaming about. Use your wits and dexterity, and prove yourself a potential champion.....

name: Rusted Warfare - RTS
short_description: {{An RTS inspired by the classics of the past!}} Making up for it's subpar retro graphics with fun gameplay and modern multi-threaded tech enabling huge battles to run smooth... Featuring singleplayer challenges, skirmish, sandbox, 10-player multiplayer & workshop modding.

name: Trojan Inc.
short_description: Will you be able to infect all devices of the world? «Trojan Inc.» - simulator, which will involve you in a world of computer viruses and trojans.

name: Batter Up! VR
short_description: Batter Up! VR is a delightful casual cake baking game for the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift. Bake cakes solo for your customers with an evolving variety of tools, make your bakery beautiful, and rake in the dough! Order your friends around as they play as your minions, fetching ingredients and helping you bake cakes!

name: The Fleet
short_description: Take back your home world from alien invaders! Forge an Intergalactic Alliance (with untrustworthy allies) to reclaim your planet; blast your way to victory with an ever-expanding arsenal. Will you sacrifice civilian lives to exact vengeance on your enemies?

name: Super Pilot
short_description: Super Pilot is a F-Zero inspired arcade futuristic racer that lets you create, edit and share your tracks in the blink of an eye.

name: Nucvivor
short_description: Are you ready for a post-apocalyptic adventure? Nucvivor is one of the greatest independent games that has you fight to survive. You will feel Death breathing down the back of your neck as you fight against deadly incendiary radiation, hunger, thirst, cold and poisonous weather.

name: CrisisActionVR
short_description: CrisisActionVR is a multiplayer co-op FPS VR game. Competitive confrontation, team adventure, cooperative survival and a series of different games to meet the FPS VR game different fantasy. Invite your friends, take up arms, fight together!

name: Raging Loop
short_description: The feast has begun, can you escape the village alive?

name: Pixel Sketch
short_description: Become the best painter in the universe in this colorful online game!

name: Arcsaber VR
short_description: Arcsaber VR is a fast-paced, zero-gravity game with unique melee combat. Fly through space "superman-style" and use the Arcsaber to destroy the bombs before they reach Earth!

name: Aliens In The Yard
short_description: The aliens have decided to steal the Earth's most precious artifacts: your backyard junk. Defend your backyard with fireworks!

name: SCP Area 8
short_description: The function of the secret SCP Foundation facilities is to contain and study anomalous objects, but something went wrong.

name: I See Your Pain
short_description: Life is useless and full of lies, betrayal and disappointment. I’ve been hurt for so long. It’s time to pull the knives out of my back and aim it to the enemies.

name: Jurassic World Evolution
short_description: Place yourself at the heart of the Jurassic franchise and build your own Jurassic World. Bioengineer dinosaurs that think, feel and react intelligently to the world around them and face threats posed by espionage, breakouts and devastating tropical storms in an uncertain world where life always finds a way.

name: Bullet Dodge
short_description: Dodge, block, or shoot. Whatever you do, survive. Use your amazing reflexes to dodge out of the way of an onslaught of bullets. Use your slow time ability to get the edge. Don’t get hit in the head or it’s game over.

name: Marie's Room
short_description: Marie's Room is a short story exploration game about an unconventional friendship between two classmates. You play as Kelsey, remembering Marie's room as it was twenty years ago. But something’s off. What happened to Marie?

name: Colony Ship: A Post-Earth Role Playing Game
short_description: Colony Ship is a turn-based, party-based role-playing game set aboard a generation ship launched to Proxima Centauri. The game features a detailed skill-based character system, multiple ways to handle quests, choices & consequences, and branching dialogue trees.

name: Hand of the Gods
short_description: Command the Gods, strategically position your forces, and unleash divine powers to defeat your foes in the new turn-based strategy CCG from the makers of SMITE and Paladins!

name: Pixel Devil and the Broken Cartridge
short_description: Classic platformer in the style of Pixel-art. The main character goes to the world of 8-bit games to save his girlfriend. Help him to find new abilities and find out who is behind the abduction of the girl.

name: Choice of the Star Captain
short_description: Fight on the front lines of the war between humanity and the hideous Blobs. (Not that anyone has actually seen a Blob up close, but everyone knows they’re hideous!) Go on stealth missions, run alien blockades, and investigate mysterious planets, "aided" by Lloyd, your insufferably obnoxious shipboard computer.

name: Reckless Space Pirates
short_description: You have a choice: join a crew of space pirates to steal priceless slime from a nest of mushroom-like aliens--or hoodwink the pirates and team up with the mushroom colony to prevent an interstellar war!

name: Choice
short_description: Hardcore first-person game. You're going to die at every step. There are no checkpoints and mercy. Only suffering and pain.

name: Hell Dimension VR
short_description: Hell Dimension VR is an arcade-style horror FPS game. You must escape from the city devastated by mysterious monsters! Use points obtained from the game to purchase diverse and different weapons! Two-handed weapons are especially entertaining with their stylish and exciting gameplay that can’t be found in any other FPS games.

name: 428: Shibuya Scramble
short_description: A kidnapping on the streets of Shibuya brings together a hot-blooded detective, hard-hitting journalist, former gang leader, the head researcher of a big pharma manufacturer and a part-timer stuck in cat costume for a series of events each more unexpected and outrageous than the last.

name: FINAL FANTASY XV WINDOWS EDITION MOD ORGANIZER
short_description: Official MOD TOOLS for the Windows edition of Final Fantasy XV offer new possibilities to our users! Create data to incorporate into the world of FINAL FANTASY XV WINDOWS EDITION for a whole new experience.

name: Damascus Gear Operation Tokyo HD
short_description: Mecha Hack'n'Slash ”Damascus Gear: Operation Tokyo HD Edition", now appearing in full HD graphics on Steam! Build your very own weapon system "Gear", and reclaim our lost world! The battle for humanity to retake Tokyo begins now!

name: Antiquia Lost
short_description: An authentic RPG of a journey with a girl made of slime! Enjoy fluid 2D turn-based battles! Bine is a young man who lives in a small rural village. One day, he is asked by Lunaria, a girl who lives near the village, to go with her to the royal capital...

name: Boobs vs Zombies
short_description: Boobs. Zombies.

name: Bikini Island
short_description: 3 hot supermodels must survive on a dangerous exotic island. Enough for the rescue squad to come for you? Pick 3 girls among 5 and see if you can resist a full week in this survival game mixing elements of RPG, management and simulation.

name: Tokaido
short_description: Discover the digital adaptation of Tokaido, the board game phenomenon!

name: It's Quiz Time
short_description: It's Quiz Time lets up to 8 players compete against each other to find out who the true quiz master is! Presented by Salli, the latest and greatest in quiz hosting technology, this game has over 30,000 questions ready for you, covering all the popular films, songs, books, and video games!

name: Raft
short_description: Raft™ throws you and your friends into an epic oceanic adventure! Alone or together, players battle to survive a perilous voyage across a vast sea! Gather debris, scavenge reefs and build your own floating home, but be wary of the man-eating sharks!

name: Vehicle VR
short_description: Welcome to Vehicle, an addicting and rage-inducing game. Your goal is to complete levels by getting to the finish box. All maps are made to test your common knowledge and quick reflexes. Compete with your friends and people around the globe to get the fastest times! VR is not required.

name: Intel 5G VR Experience
short_description: EXPERIENCE THE EXCITEMENT & PROMISE OF THE 5G ERA 5G is almost upon us. Billions of things will interconnect. Cities, homes and workplaces will transform. Visit the future! Guided by ANA, your effervescent hostess, feel the impact of the next generation of networks.

name: Guano Gladiators
short_description: The party game nobody asked for, but everybody needs. Guano Gladiators is a local multiplayer competitive brawler for 2-4 players! Assume the role of adorable creatures and attempt to poop on your friends to find out who reigns aerial excrement superiority.

name: DMT: Dynamic Music Tesseract
short_description: DMT is a mind-bending 3D visualization of vast 4-dimensional objects driven by your music! This is not for everyone, but the people who like it really seem to like it! If you want to zone out listening to your music and watching trippy visuals, then this is for you.

name: Illuminary
short_description: You find yourself catapulted back in time to the beginning of existence, and into the darkness where everything began. The Universe is yet to be born from a glimmer of light. You are called to discover and co-create a new existence with the help of colours and sound.

name: You Shall Not Jump: PC Master Race Edition
short_description: You Shall Not Jump is a roguelike put into a good old tower climber. At first sight it’s all plain and simple: you jump and shoot. But in reality…

name: Isle in the Sky
short_description: Fast paced archery game! You are trapped on a small island in the sky, delaying your inevitable death by rocks smashing into your head. - This game is not for the weak! - Be prepared for a thorough workout, where you have to duck, weave and move around a lot!

name: Magician's Gambit
short_description: Chess! Magic! VR! Play this age-old Game of Kings against the best strategic mind in the Kingdom - a master tactician and chess paragon unlike any other. Word is he has never been defeated... Will you rise to the challenge?

name: Phobia
short_description: Horror. Nightmare. Fear. Monsters. Madness. And again ... And again ....

name: The Seasons
short_description: So......What choice will you make?

name: RADtv
short_description: Shoot, eat, throw, slice, feed, hit, catch and more in RADtv, a hot-seat multiplayer VR party game. Get sweaty with your friends as you vie to come top of the leaderboard!

name: Wisdom of War
short_description: Wisdom of War is a real-time strategy game with unique style. Different from general real-time strategy game, the game only needs to operate a hero for various activities. This greatly reduces the demands for hands’ operation speed in traditional real-time strategy game so that players can focus on strategy application.

name: Yesterday
short_description: It's a 3D Puzzle Game talking about the philosophy of love and encounter from female's perspective. All we experienced in countless “yesterday” make us be ourselves today. Beautiful visual performance and intriguing music immerse players in this fantasy world soon, where dreams mix with reality, time and space interweave together.

name: Deadly Escape
short_description: Deadly Escape is a Survival Horror game made with pixel art graphics, inspired by survival horror games of the '90s.

name: Space Panic: Room Escape (VR)
short_description: Space Panic VR (Room Escape) is a VR Escape Room unlike any other you've seen before. Set in the future aboard a space station, the game will challenge players to solve multiple complex puzzles in order to escape.

name: Bullet VR
short_description: The year 2020. You are a real war hero, who has gone through a lot and seen a lot of bad things, but you has not seen anything like that. A huge threat has come to your favorite planet - the Earth.

name: L.A.P.D. 2195
short_description: A modern Multiplayer and Co-Op re-imagining of the classic game "Future Cop L.A.P.D.”, you are a rookie cop in the Mech-Assisted Security and Tactics (M.A.S.T.) unit of the Los Angeles Police Department in the year 2195.

name: Dash Dash Run!
short_description: Dash Dash Run! The frantic VR arcade runner that has you pumping those arms, performing to the crowd, and racing at crazy speeds across a wild selection of vibrant courses.

name: Twins of the Pasture
short_description: This is a story about twin sisters who live in the pasture. Their parents ran away leaving a huge debt. Two sisters have to pay back money in 120 days…

name: Swords and Sandals 2 Redux
short_description: The world's favourite gladiator game has returned, bigger and more action packed than ever. Swords and Sandals 2: Emperor's Reign, remastered with all new graphics, music and powerful new skills and awesome Arena Champions Pharoah King, John the Butcher and Ultra Flavlus

name: VR Battleship YAMATO
short_description: Full Scale Restoration of the Japanese battleship “Yamato” in VR. Battleship Yamato was constructed during the World War Ⅱ in 1941, and it was the biggest battleship ever built. Unfortunately, Yamato didn’t last through the war, and it sank to the bottom of the sea. Now, battleship Yamato is completely restored in full scale in VR.

name: DarkMaze
short_description: In the dark claustrophobic labyrinth, would you feel scared, depression and at a loss? Give you a flashlight, forward exploration; start your sixth sense, find the end point through the maze!

name: Ashes Cricket
short_description: Ashes Cricket is the officially licensed video game of cricket’s greatest rivalry. Bringing all the fast paced action, big hits and skill that you see in the greatest cricket competition on earth, you’ll be able to play in the men’s and women’s 2017/2018 Ashes tours.

name: LIBERTY VR
short_description: LIBERTY VR is an action adventure game, taking place in alternative version of American Revolution. Main protagonist is the American soldier who is fighting against evil created by ancient alien race.

name: ZHUST - THE ILLUSION SOUL
short_description: ZHUST - THE ILLUSION SOUL is third person Hack & Slash game with various combo and fast-paced attack moveset.

name: OfficeBots: Reality Bytes [VR]
short_description: OfficeBots: Reality Bytes is a little game with a big heart. Explore a wonderfully weird corporate office, listen to your robotic co-workers’ stories, and help to solve their problems. Ultimately your goal is to find a way to escape, but your journey to freedom will give you many opportunities to brighten up another's life.

name: CRAFT BATTLE SIMULATOR
short_description: CRAFT BATTLE SIMULATOR is an awesome multiplayer game. You have to control a ship with the crew and cannons going around destroying other ships. This game is tons of fun to play with friends or even alone as you can single handedly dismantle a fleet if you’re skilled enough.

name: Coregrounds
short_description: Welcome to the Coregrounds: a competitive RTS game with elements of MOBA and Tower Defense. Master your micro, expand your strategic diversity and become a champion of the Coregrounds in this indie free-to-play game with cross-platform multiplayer.

name: Harvest Life
short_description: Show your mettle as both an aspiring organic farmer and a part-time adventurer. And then you might be in for a romantic happy ending.

name: Windstorm: Start of a Great Friendship
short_description: Discover the fascinating story of Mika, a girl known as a horse whisperer, as she tries to befriend the black stallion called Windstorm.

name: Slime-san: Blackbird's Kraken
short_description: The notorious Blackbird's kracked, I mean, cracked! He believes Slime-san stole his treasure and unleashed his giant Kraken upon him! Sound familiar? It is now up to Slime-san to escape the giant squid's jaws back out to freedom!

name: NitroRage
short_description: NitroRage - crazy multiplayer races with weapons. Destroy your competitors using the minigun, rocket launcher, flamethrower and other guns, or abuse of the machine with a RAM-style Derby. Drive using nitro boosts, jump with springboard on the roofs of buildings, and the demolition of funiture stores and offices, find on the map new...

name: Disco Time 80s VR
short_description: The 80s are back! Enter the Dancefloor and celebrate an 80s club party in VR.

name: Caliban Below
short_description: A short interactive story for room-scale VR: Become Caliban, the scion of a broken lineage struggling to understand your dark inheritance. Explore the ruins of the family estate, and the incredible realm below seeking clues to your past, and to the events that severed you from your family long ago.

name: Tick Tick Pass
short_description: The ultimate trivia game, Tick Tick Pass is a list-filling game suitable for single players or parties alike, with hundreds of hours of content!

name: Ragdoll Kanojo
short_description: Have fun with your own virtual ragdoll girl! Customize clothes and style, pose! VR IS OPTIONAL! (But recommended) You can play on your monitor too!

name: NOKBAK
short_description: Nokbak is a first-person multiplayer arena shooter... with a twist! Built for 3 to 8 players, players don't shoot to kill, but rather find themselves frantically trying to knock each other off of an arena in the sky.

name: Micro Cosmic Worlds
short_description: Micro Cosmic Worlds is a discovery based journey into unseen worlds of the microcosmos. Using the power of virtual reality, you (the player) are transported deeper and deeper into the worlds of the infinitesimally small.

name: PHAT STACKS 2
short_description: Phat Stacks 2 is puzzle platformer, it features completely new gameplay with a new set of characters, the goal of Phat Stacks 2 is to collect and process crystals by knocking them into the right chutes for a payout. Each level gets harder and presents a new challenge as you progress

name: Horse Racing 2016
short_description: Horse Racing 2016 is most Fabulous and Entertaining Game for Everyone. If you want to feel real horse racing championship, show your desire and courage to play this game. This Game Uniqueness makes you play this game for hours, you will love to play this game again and again.

name: Krieg
short_description: Built from the ground up for VR, Krieg is a team-based fantasy multiplayer competitive game. Thrown into the middle of a war between The King's Army and The Ancients, only the strongest will survive. This war of epic mercenaries and guardians will decide the fate of the realm.

name: Paddle Battle
short_description: Paddle Battle is a fast-paced local multiplayer party game for up to 4 players! Out-shoot, dodge, defend, and race your opponents - to the death!

name: HOCKEY SPACE
short_description: Fast button-based low rule local multiplayer hockey game. I think it's fun with friends, but most things are.

name: Mahjong Masters: Temple of the Ten Gods
short_description: A mahjong quest to construct an ancient temple and invoke the Gods

name: Screaming Eagles
short_description: Screaming Eagles is a flight top-down shooter that exemplifies everything that all great shooters of reference would include. Flashy effects, millions of enemies, huge bosses, it’s a retro-inspired shooter fit for gamers of old and new.

name: Tense Reflection
short_description: Tense Reflection is an innovative puzzle / shooter. Solve puzzles in order to reload your ammo / change the color of your shots while enemies are constantly progressing. Better be quick !

name: F.E.X (Forced Evolution Experiment)
short_description: In F.E.X (Forced Evolution Experiment) you are a failed experiment in a facility where they manipulate human DNA in order to stop the aging process. You are able to grow old at will, but you can't reverse the process. Get out before your time runs out or you get caught.

name: tick-hunter
short_description: Tik-hunter - first-person game with elements of horror.

name: This Strange Realm Of Mine
short_description: This Strange Realm Of Mine is a First Person Shooter mixed with poetry and psychological horror. Graphic style is 3D mixed with pixel art.

name: Tallowmere 2: Curse of the Kittens
short_description: Lady Tallowmere's kittens have been acting strange. Still, the dungeon's rituals must be carried out. Despite the unusual circumstances, how many rooms can you clear?

name: Trigger Spree
short_description: Unrealistic FPS

name: Beast Mode: Night of the Werewolf Silver Bullet Edition
short_description: Beast Mode: Night of the Werewolf - Unleash your inner beast, rack up epic kills, and dominate the online leaderboards in this over-the-top Arcade Action spectacle!

name: Crimson Gray
short_description: John is a young man suffering from severe depression. As he loses his sense of purpose in life, he begins to see the world in unfocused gray. Just when he begins to lose all hope, John meets a girl... a very special girl.

name: Project 5: Sightseer
short_description: Open world multiplayer sandbox/RPG game. Explore, gather, build, research, and fight to protect what's yours -- by yourself or together with your friends.

name: Fly Simulator
short_description: You work as a waiter and lead an uphill battle for their clients. You pushing back the flies from the food, otherwise you'll never get anything. Maybe you are a hungry insect trying to increase their population? Choose the opposing side. The war is already underway.

name: BULLET PARTY
short_description: The party co-op shoot ’em up! Become the king of the night club! Go alone or group your friends! Shoot the party crashers down!

name: Merri Puzzle
short_description: Merri Puzzle is a physics based puzzle solving game, with a unique look and feel to it. The goal is simple, getting an object, often a ball to the end of a maze.

name: Elo Hell
short_description: Elo Hell is a one-of-a-kind game that employs a 3 part user experience: Play the narrative, play the minigames, climb in Echo Star. You ain't never played a game like this.

name: Exocomets
short_description: Exocomets is a basic yet difficult action game where you try to survive as long as possible against incoming waves of comets. One hit, and your ship is dead. Survive for as long as possible by collecting powerups and stars to beat every level!

name: Wonfourn
short_description: Wonfourn challenges you to fulfill your destiny by embarking on a grand adventure seeking fame, fortune and glory. The firstborn chosen child from each of the games 6 nations have come of age and must prove their worth in an epic quest of survival.

name: Beta Runner
short_description: Prepare yourself for the ultimate, "run till you die" game, which pits you against a maniacal programmer - a smart AI that intuitively adapts to your level of gameplay. Prove you're not just another one of his "guinea pigs" as he throws ever increasingly complex challenges at you. His goal is your frustration.

name: The Wolf's Bite
short_description: The Wolf's Bite is a one-versus-one choose-your-own-adventure game with an entrepreneur fairy tale twist. Inspired by stories such as "The Three Little Pigs" and "The Stinky Cheeseman and Other Fairly Stupid Tales", the game revolves around thwarting the other player while ensuring your business thrives.

name: SkiFy
short_description: SkiFy is a flight simulator where you can explore different biomes, collect objects and go through levels accompanied by relaxing music.

name: Better Off Tread
short_description: Better Off Tread is a nonstop arena combat game with up to twelve players squaring off against each other using a collection of unusual – and often comical – armored vehicles.

name: Mr. Triangle's Maze
short_description: Escape a sinister maze and take on the Maze Masters in this retro styled puzzle game!

name: Fantasya Final Definitiva REMAKE
short_description: Dois clássicos do RPG Maker que conquistaram os brasileiros a uma década atrás, agora reunidos em uma única compilação na Steam!

name: King Erik
short_description: In this Medieval 2D platformer game, you play as King Erik, a young man who has acquired the Scepter of Might and must fight his way through tricky passages and deadly contraptions to regain his kingdom from the clutches of his Uncle's Saxon armies!

name: PLANETS OF WAR
short_description: This is a Short Clicking Adventure Game in which you Save Earth from an Alien Invasion.

name: RadianVR
short_description: RadianVR is an old-school puzzle game with a twist. Colors are materials. Matching is based on rotation. Everything is realistic. With a wide range of special effects—such as locking, rainbow blocks and automatic flipping—the depth and difficulty increase as you play.

name: THE HOUCHI PLAY -THE 放置プレイ-
short_description: The aim of this game is to maneuver Taro Heibon and get close to the cos-play girls without being noticed. It's the right time to get close to them when they are facing away, so try to move closer before they face round. After passing all the stages, you can register the girls in your Gallery.

name: 电竞俱乐部/ESports Club
short_description: ESports Club is a sim game based on electronic sports industry, including most popular game types such as FPS and MOBA. What are you still waiting for? Start your esports career now!

name: ROMBY
short_description: In ROMBY you will earn points by placing 4 and even more figures of one color in a straight line. Earn more points and open all hidden girls. Trust me it won't be easy.

name: Sorcerer's Dream
short_description: Boy meets girl against a backdrop of magical battles in a dramatic visual novel!

name: Heat
short_description: Survive the wilderness, build a home, raise a family, and expand your territory. Gain power as President, deliver justice as Sheriff, fight for your tribe as Chief, or show some southern hospitality as Governor. Begin your new life in 19th century America.

name: APEX Tournament
short_description: Apex Tournament is the most fast-paced Team Death Match in VR. The primary method of movement is the Hyper Dash system, which turns your body into the controller - allowing movements at blazing speeds.

name: Fractus
short_description: Abstract arcade action!

name: RD's Adventure Mini Golf
short_description: RD's Adventure Mini Golf - Chip & Putt Edition is a game I developed for my Son. It comes packed with 3 x 18 hole courses, with additional courses to be added in future updates! The version you are about to purchase (I hope) or download if your already own the game is a complete redesign of the game.

name: Planet Protector VR
short_description: Defend your city from alien invaders in this colorful virtual reality game! Aim, shoot, and protect your planet for as long as you can!

name: Outpost L5
short_description: Battle wave after wave of invading aliens in the last Space Outpost protecting Earth. Outpost L5 is a Virtual Reality game that will take you back to Classic 8-Bit Arcades, but now in an immersive first person shooter. Alien Identity "It's Space Invaders in VR!"

name: SOLITAIRE ULTRA
short_description: The best Solitaire game on Steam! Get lost in space and time as you chill out to classic Solitaire gameplay, beautiful high-def visuals, awesome ambient soundtrack, and tons of unlockables.

name: UnderMine
short_description: An action-adventure roguelike with a bit of RPG tossed in. Adventure deep into the UnderMine and discover powerful relics, deadly enemies, hidden secrets, and a few friends to help along the way.

name: BOUNCED
short_description: BOUNCED, is a beautiful low-poly 3D Platforming game that is easy to play, but hard to master.

name: Chicken Daddy
short_description: You are a man in a chicken onesie. You have nothing except your new family of chicks who follow you everywhere you go. Think fast and defend your family against the hordes of giant worms of destruction!

name: Attrition: Tactical Fronts
short_description: Attrition: Tactical Fronts is a quick play, turn-based strategy game for 1-2 players. Matches can take as little as 5 minutes while offering strategic variety and depth.

name: Explomania
short_description: Explomania is a physically based game with untraditional gaming mechanics. You place property modifiers within the level to determine property, strength and direction of the action.

name: Alien Hallway 2
short_description: We're happy to present a new game in the Alien Shooter universe! Get prepared to unique tactical gameplay, lots of monster types and 8 fighter types allowing you create your own style of completing missions and defeating bosses.

name: Vostok Inc.
short_description: Do you love money? You’re the newly appointed CEO of Vostok Inc. As a greedy, space-capitalist your ultimate goal is to make as much as you can.

name: Hidden Animals: English - Spanish
short_description: Hidden Animals: English - Spanish is a relaxing hidden object game with the aim to teach you the Spanish names of animals featuring exclusive piano music. (You can use the program to study English as well if you are a Spaniard).

name: Automobile Tycoon
short_description: Car manufacturing company simulator. Turn-based, fast paced, covers 100 years of automotive history.

name: Epic Car Factory
short_description: Epic Car Factory puts you in the drivers seat of your very own car company. Build, market, hire, fire, and more in this fast paced business simulation. The failure and success of the company depends entirely on your decisions and how you react to the ever changing market place.

name: Pro Gamer Manager 2
short_description: Pro Gamer Manager 2 is an e-sport simulator game. Create, manage and compete with your own team of Pro Gamers. Conquer all obstacles and become the number one team in the world!

name: A2Be - A Science-Fiction Narrative
short_description: In the far future, the invention of instantaneous and waste-free transportation has brought a new age of utopia for humanity. Explore this brave vision of our destiny, and see its many wonders.

name: Shadow Bug
short_description: Leap, slash, splash! You are the overpowered ninja hero Shadow Bug! Save your home forest from the evil factory by slicing monsters to pieces.

name: Castaway Home Designer
short_description: People are calling this app the best game to design your own interiors in! Create beautiful, stylish interiors that show how creative you are! Youtubers can't stop streaming Castaway games, download and find out why!

name: In the Raven Shadow
short_description: In the Raven Shadow is in the best sense an old-fashioned adventure game for all sense-seeking people.

name: Claws of Furry
short_description: Punch and claw your way through forty fast paced levels of pure mayhem, while honing your Ninja Cat skills, in order to rescue your Master from the evil claws of an unknown enemy.

name: Eight-Minute Empire
short_description: Eight-Minute Empire is the super-quick area control game requiring tough decisions. It’s easy to learn and perfect for when you only have a few minutes. ⏱

name: Slash It Ultimate
short_description: Play the rhythm of a song through various game modes and compete with other players!

name: Red Wake Carnage
short_description: Red Wake Carnage is an intense action shooter that will take you on an epic journey of fighting the world’s most horrifying animals!

name: Circuit Warz
short_description: The hardest electronics game you will ever play, only good engineers need apply. Test your understanding of electronic circuits to save the planet in a desperate race against time. The laser protection system has been sabotaged…You have minutes to fix the circuits, repair the generator by solving the circuits correctly, fire the laser...

name: Dead of Night
short_description: Dead of Night is a 2D flipscreen adventure game inspired by such 8-bit classics as Spike in Transylvania, Bride of Frankenstein, Werewolves of London and the Dizzy series.

name: Kalzor: 2000
short_description: Shoot different types of spaceships while avoiding getting shot yourself. Kill 10 minutes at a time with this affordable colourful timewaster.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 15: Ancient Land
short_description: Enjoy new multi-color mosaic puzzles in prehistoric settings! Join the penguin family on a journey to an ancient land and discover the mysteries of the penguin ancestors! Enjoy this new collection of mosaic puzzles in a variety of colors while exploring the prehistoric landscape.

name: Bomb Defense
short_description: A completely different take on the tower defense genre. Combining it with the Puzzle genre, making for a difficult game. Buy traps, bombs, turrets and walls and place them in optimal positions to defend against enemies.

name: Medieval Steve
short_description: Steve - a magic pile of armour - is destined save the world. Use your abilities in this fast paced side-scroller, to help you crush your enemies, collect gems and upgrade your character, making you stronger, faster and unstoppable!

name: RICO
short_description: Two cops, one case and only 24 hours to bust the bad guys! Become a loose cannon police detective and face off with criminal gangs in this procedurally-generated action movie FPS. Join forces with a friend and take down those crooks, buddy-cop style!

name: Block Robot Mini Survival Game
short_description: In this action game you can try your survival and strategy skills as well.You available to choose different characters like ironman,  soldiers or many more. Enjoy the low-poly visual experience. Play together with your friends and share your victory!

name: Cosmonator
short_description: Cosmonator is an 'RPG-em-up': a hybrid of classic fast-paced top-down shoot-em-up action infused with deep character building elements. Build up your own unique alien-killing machine to avenge the destruction of planet Earth!

name: Douarnenez VR
short_description: Douarnenez VR offers you to visit the archaeological site of Plomarc'h Pella as well as the Norwegian galleon Anna Rosa. Come to Douarnenez to discover them in real life!

name: Bullyparade - DER Spiel
short_description: For the 20th anniversary of the legendary comedy show, Bully & Co are coming back to the big cinema screen. And on your PC!

name: Infestus
short_description: A Kingdom in turmoil, a rising darkness in the North, will you take on the challenges ahead?

name: Death Maze
short_description: Path of life and death.

name: Cybercube
short_description: Cybercube is a fun platformer with many colorful levels. The goal of the game is avoiding obstacles with various mechanics.

name: Jewel Venture
short_description: Jewel Venture is an exciting puzzle game that takes match-3 gameplay to new heights!

name: RHEM I SE: The Mysterious Land
short_description: RHEM is a first person adventure featuring brain-teasing puzzles for your PC.

name: Space Hit
short_description: On SPACE HIT you finished your space mission, and it's just time to come back home, but your journey will not be so easy as you think...

name: The Theodore Adventures
short_description: Help the little Theodore reach Juicy Island, immerse yourself in classical retro style 80's, accumulate coins to proceed between mysterious island levels. Be quick and do not stop.

name: MagiCat
short_description: MagiCat is a side-scrolling platformer inspired by the retro games from 16-bit era. The game features a cute magical cat adventuring 63 levels, each with their own unique boss battle spread across 7 worlds.

name: Rising Hell
short_description: Rising Hell is a vertical platformer rogue-lite filled with adrenaline-pumping action and tons of heavy gothic metal shreds. Climb out from the ever-changing hell while you fight hordes of blood-lusting demons.

name: Lucky Night: Texas Hold'em VR
short_description: Have an enjoyable Texas hold’em game in virtual room with real players by HTC Vive or Oculus Rift.

name: Save Dash
short_description: Save Dash is a simple yet challenging hardcore running arcade game.

name: The Myth Seekers: The Legacy of Vulcan
short_description: Discover the truth about the legacy of ancient gods!

name: Humanity Must Perish
short_description: Humanity Must Perish is a short, comedic visual novel in which the fate of humanity is placed in the hands of a witty, pessimistic android.

name: Himegimi Detective
short_description: Sayla Limehult, First Princess to the Kingdom of Ratania, shall set off for the far-away land of Japan to learn about the wider world and her role within it. As both a princess, and a world-class detective!

name: Dream Hills: Captured Magic
short_description: A treacherous witch has cast Dream Hills into darkness, depriving its residents of happiness and joy. Save your favorite fairy tale characters, break the curse, and restore Dream Hills to its former glory.

name: Project Taurus
short_description: Project Taurus is an arcade racing game built for a fun-first multiplayer experience with highly addictive game-play. Smash into cars, launch your friends into walls and abuse the AI in single-player. The game is yours to make what you want.

name: Robothorium
short_description: Robothorium is a cyberpunk dungeon crawler with turn-based fights, where all your choices will have a direct impact on your revolution against Humankind. Deep Strategy, Crafting, Party Based management, Talents and so much more in this roguelike!

name: 2 Planets Fire and Ice
short_description: Experience what may very well be the fastest match-3 game of all time –Two Planets Ice & Fire! Approx. 140 levels with diverse objectives guarantee non-stop gaming fun!

name: Flix and Chill 2: Millennials
short_description: A dating sim where you jump into the shoes of the modern Millennial to find yourself and love in a time when true romance seems fleeting.

name: Shoot 'm Up
short_description: Tactical multiplayer chaos.That's what would describe this game in 3 words. It's fast, it's messy, it's challenging. Do you like blowing up zombies to bits together with your friends? Protecting your base from the enemy team? Grab your gear and start the chaos!

name: The Adliberum Engine (ADLENGINE)
short_description: A homage to Text Adventures and Multi-User Dungeons of old... The Adliberum Engine allows you to create text adventures, muds and text-powered roleplaying games. Complete with world editing commands; create worlds, games and puzzles that you can share or play with others all in real-time.

name: Hand Simulator
short_description: There are many different levels where you can play with spinners, plunge into the subtleties of handling weapons, milk a cow, take part in a Mexican duel with your friends, have a good time fishing, play chess or simply chat in an anonymous club.

name: The Afterwoods
short_description: In this VR first person RPG, a young mage embarks on a perilous journey to gather friendly familiars, find lost magic, and learn the secrets of the dark woods to defeat a dangerous nemesis who has taken the realm.

name: Spirit of the Ancient Forest
short_description: Learn how a simple girl Sarah managed to frustrate the plans of the Dark Lord and to save the Great Tree, which was the soul of the Ancient Forest.

name: Tracks - The Train Set Game
short_description: Jump into the ultimate toy sandbox and build the train set of your dreams! Create colourful railway systems, decorate beautiful towns, transport commuting passengers, and even ride your train in first-person.

name: Maid Delight
short_description: Maid Delight is a series of adult graphic novels featuring characters from the base game Maid Cafe. Each chapter features different character in a variety of very adult settings.

name: 救う(SHE SAVE)
short_description: "SHE SAVE" is a short action game that a girl with horns fights to save something. It's necessary to fight dragons that have big power in her mission. She can not jump over an attack of dragon, but she can attack by a sword, and can protects by a shield, can heal by magic.

name: Rytmik Studio
short_description: Rytmik Studio is a music creation software based around a beautifully simple, yet wonderfully powerful concept. It’s flexible, instant and fun. Create a basic melody in a few steps, compose a great song in a few minutes, and show your musical flare with a whole range of instruments and effects.

name: Blind Men
short_description: A boys' love visual novel about an aspiring super villain and the spies he meets while trying to make a name for himself.

name: Party Crashers
short_description: Party Crashers is a last-car-standing combat racer for one to four players! It aims to provide the same fast-paced competitive couchplay as games like Micro Machines, Mashed, and Wrecked, and also follows in the footsteps of Party Golf, with crazy customisable options for everything our player community can think of.

name: Mimic Hunter
short_description: Unsheathe your sword and your hardcore platforming skills to climb forsaken towers, fight nefarious Mimics, and solve unforgiving puzzles in an attempt to uncover the grim truth behind the nature of the Unbound and stop an ancient demonic force from devouring the mortal world. En garde!

name: Electronics Circuits Simulator
short_description: Learn electronic circuits in a new and exciting way and increase your understanding of basic electronic circuits. Seven complete levels to assess your knowledge of basic electronic circuits including Series Parallel Resistor circuits, Resistor Capacitor (RC) filters, Graetz Bridges, Wheatstone bridges, Weighted summing amplifiers,...

name: Burn It Down
short_description: You awaken in your mansion and discover that your love is missing. She has been kidnapped but it's unclear by whom.

name: Claybreaker - VR Clay Shooting
short_description: Claybreaker is a virtual reality clay shooting game.

name: Take Off - The Flight Simulator
short_description: Fly more than 20 airplanes in an open world or try out more than 40 exciting and varied missions – from airfreighting to dramatic rescue operations!

name: Dark Skies: The Nemansk Incident
short_description: A very personal shooter project with focus on atmosphere and exploration. Every step could be your last. Set in the fictional Nemansk Region in Eastern Europe, your task is to find information about a meteorite and a missing science team.

name: Hold the Line: The American Revolution
short_description: Hold the Line covers battles fought during the American Revolution. This game is a careful conversion of the board game of the same name developed by Worthington Publishing. Jump in and take command of the American or British forces during this pivotal moment in the history of nations!

name: Impresja
short_description: Impresja is an exploration game taking place in a dynamic, non-Euclidean world that can be reconfigured by player through manipulation of art pieces.

name: quadrantica
short_description: In quadrantica your task is to find the correct sequence of moves to unify a field of pillars.  Your moves are limited, so think ahead.

name: Dodgeball
short_description: Throw your ball at a player, or hold it to block incoming balls; or if you're really brave try to catch a ball and get your teammates to spawn back in. Get your friends together and host a game for some fast-paced competitive fun.

name: What!? My Neighbors Are Demons!!?
short_description: Due to her insatiability in a failed relationship, Selene is attempting to keep her unusual lust under control. However, things start getting strange (and lewd) when a pair of mischievous sex demons move in next door to her. It doesn't take rocket science to figure out where this is going!

name: Grav Blazer
short_description: Grav Blazer is an arcade space shooter with a focus on fast paced action. Skill based firing mechanics, rotational controlled power attacks, increasing level difficulty, and endless procedurally generated levels are some of the features players will experience.

name: Fidget Spinner
short_description: Fidget Spinner, the game you were all waiting for, yes, also you who are reading, I know that in the depths of your heart, you were waiting for a game like this!

name: Shaman Flower
short_description: You have to grow flower from undergrounds. Two shamans will provide Sun and Rain for this purpose.

name: The Caribbean Sail
short_description: Name your crew, purchase supplies, sail the world, harpoon fish, plunder your enemies, die horribly, unlock a new Captain and do it all over again!

name: The Automatician
short_description: Take on the role of Emma in a first person puzzle game, solve puzzles and problems in a Victorian mansion. Prove your worth as a candidate to become "The Automatician" and build increasingly complex chain reaction machines. Can you become the new Automatician?

name: Rome Circus Maximus: Chariot Race VR
short_description: Horse chariot race Circus Maximus of ancient Rome (VR)

name: Defense of Roman Britain
short_description: Tower defense Game to safeguard the land of Rome.

name: Crafting Dead
short_description: Crafting Dead is a post-apocalyptic multiplayer-based zombie survival game with a voxel theme. Aim high and punch low, survive at all costs!

name: The Dragons' Twilight
short_description: Classic 90's Style Turn-Based RPG. All of the feels with minimal grind!

name: Valentine Panic
short_description: A memory game that has you racing to keep your job and find a some potential love for Valentine's Day!

name: Galaxy Crash
short_description: Galaxy Crash is Space Action Adventure that puts you in the middle of one of the longest space wars know to mankind. Fight off Enemies, Infiltrate Bases and build your way to becoming the hero that the galaxy deserves.

name: Mad Sector
short_description: Its 1992. The stores are flooded with games, a bright box catches your eye. Walking to the shelf, the box reads "Mad-Sector".

name: Sakura Sakura
short_description: Sakura Sakura is a romantic comedy about two overbearing Sakuras and their light-hearted love triangle. Follow the story of Tohru Inaba as he attempts to navigate the complicated see-saw of love.

name: Skeleton Boomerang
short_description: Skeleton Boomerang is a platformer where the hero, Hunter, must use an enchanted boomerang to put an end to an army of bony soldiers led by the voodoo master Mr. Saturday. Get high scores, collect upgrades, find secrets, and overcome many skeletal challenges!

name: ClickRaid
short_description: A Multi-player incremental clicker game.

name: Mega Maze
short_description: Enter the virtual labyrinths of Mega Maze and challenge your spatial awareness capabilities to not simply find the exit, but to also find a way to unlock the path to it.

name: Chambered
short_description: Chambered is a single-player, story-based VR shooting game with an emphasis on weapon progression. Featuring trackpad locomotion, 13 guns, and 140+ weapon mods, Chambered is sure to keep you playing for hours.

name: Xtrike
short_description: Xtrike is a rogue like integrated with shoot'em up, action real-time strategies game. Players need to produce battle units and also control heroes to destroy incoming enemies.

name: BLUE REFLECTION
short_description: A clear summer sky spreads over the Hoshinomiya Girls' High School. This story begins with the belated start of school life for Hinako Shirai, who has just recovered from a leg injury due to a tragic accident. The magical sisters Yuzu and Lime bestowed to her a special power to become a "Reflector".

name: Dungeon; Friends Escape!
short_description: Dungeon; Friends Escape! is a multiplayer exploration and survival game. Team up with friends or find the exit alone as you explore dark rooms filled with unknown traps, enemies, and curses.

name: Oldage
short_description: Oldage is a free to play competitive turn based game inspired by Chess

name: Triplicity
short_description: Triplicity is a fast paced and dynamic collectible card game in a stylized world of puzzles.

name: Edge of Insanity
short_description: Edge of Insanity is a first-person psychological horror game focusing on story and exploration. Your in control of Paul Carson, a TV Horror Show Host, who's currently locked in a haunted manor in search for the missing information of a crime that happened decades ago.

name: Tunnel Runner VR
short_description: Run through the infinite space twisted tunnels in multiple fantasy environments.

name: Baseball Mogul 2017
short_description: The groundbreaking franchise that revolutionized sports games continues to redefine the way you run and manage your favorite baseball team. This year's version includes more than 100 updates and new features.

name: Agents of Aggro City Online
short_description: Agents of Aggro City Online is a community based online game and adventure. Help your city get rid of the aggro levels and build your agency by defeating aggromites and researching new ways of keeping city aggro levels at minimum levels.

name: Professor Watts Word Search: Into The Ocean
short_description: Hello Professor Watts here and I need your help! I've been hard at work on my ocean expedition, collecting samples and documenting important research materials. Now that I have returned to my laboratory I find all of my research files has been jumbled about.

name: DreamTank
short_description: All the action-packed VR games wearing you down? Check out DreamTank, an interaction-light sweeping musical journey through snapshots of distant worlds, randomly generated and unique with each playthrough! What will you see when you enter the DreamTank?

name: My Personal Angel
short_description: My Personal Angel is a black and white visual novel about the complexities of relations between people. It often rains in our city, and sometimes it's difficult to differ the day from the night. Almost always the sky covered in dark gray clouds. Maybe because the city itself is a port, and the endless splashing of the raging sea.

name: GRAY GROFA
short_description: GRAY GROFA is an unparalleled side-scrolling shooter puzzle game developed for the 8-bit MSX computer. 2 years have been spent hand-tuning the game's visuals, movements and puzzles in a tireless pursuit for aesthetic perfection.

name: Airi's World
short_description: Visit Airi’s World and Join the Adventure.

name: Memories of Home
short_description: Brian Tomaskie awakens in the dead of night during a power outage. Before long, he finds that his life partner Sharon is missing.  Play as Brian in this thrilling horror experience. Solve cunning puzzles all throughout what used to be a nice suburban home, but is now a dark, unrelenting nightmare.

name: Gelu
short_description: 2D Pixel platformer about a cute character named Gelu. He can create and destroy his copies made of ice, limited number of times. With the help of ice copies he can climb on platform, pass the obstacles and pass the levels. Help Gelu to pass hard levels.

name: Pink Rage Otome
short_description: Comedy visual novel. Try yourself as a tsundere girl!

name: Tupã
short_description: A small archer faces a wizard.

name: Leilani's Island
short_description: Leilani has got to roll, jump, and smash things to take back her island from mechanical invasion! A tropical 2D platformer in the making for PC.

name: Canadian Football 2017
short_description: Fast, explosive offensive action, we have it all in our Canadian gridiron simulation title that brings to fans everything they love about how Canucks have been playing the game for more than 100 years. That means 12 players, 3 downs, 20 seconds, and no fair catch eh.

name: Against the Gradient
short_description: A microscopic world is in need of your help! Add transporters to membranes to move molecules and ions into and out of cells. Your goal is to reach specific concentrations.

name: Wrongworld
short_description: Crash-landed on a surreal, low-poly world filled with freakish inhabitants, choose between permadeath and non-permadeath modes and embark on an epic (and ridiculous) survival adventure. Will you manage to stay alive as you unravel the mysteries of Wrongworld and search for a way home?

name: Alter Ego
short_description: What if you could live your life over again?

name: Ether Awakening
short_description: After losing a war and being forced to abandon her homeland, Princess Nia can think only of revenge. Her plans are cut short when an ancient evil is released from the Ether, and she is forced to find a way of stopping it before the whole world is enslaved.

name: Zombotron
short_description: Fight to survive on a mysterious alien planet, outwit its vicious inhabitants, and do whatever it takes to find a way off that wretched rock.

name: 8-bit Adventure Anthology: Volume I
short_description: 8-bit Adventure Anthology is a compilation featuring faithful remakes of three of the best 8-bit point & click adventure games ever made. Originally released between 1987-1991, each stand-alone adventure features the same mind-blowing puzzles, graphics and music that mesmerized generations of console gamers!

name: Forgotten Faces
short_description: Alice suffers from a serious illness called prosopagnosia - she can't see people's faces. This young girl is in a mental hospital, but she doesn't remember how she got there or anything about the past. Mysterious happenings start to occur in the hospital, and as she tries to solve these mysteries, she comes across the mystery from her...

name: Zeran's Folly
short_description: You're not a bad guy just because you have murderers as friends and holy knights want to kill you, right? Lone is on a quest with his two big axes and three loyal friends to find the four artifacts he needs in a world he doesn't bother to understand.

name: Visual Novel Engine
short_description: Create, share, and play visual novels without needing ANY programming skills!

name: Triangulate
short_description: Triangulate, a game that is easy to learn but hard to master. Stack the falling triangles to create bigger triangles of the same color making them disappear along with the black background. A very simple concept, but doing it for an entire level requires quick memory, clever strategy, and great dexterity.

name: Stunt Corgi VR
short_description: You are the parent of one daring corgi that dreams of being the most famous stunt pet in the world! Place your props, build the course and direct your corgi's routine. Call “Action!” to watch the stunt unfold. It won't always go the way you plan, but that's the fun!

name: The Initial
short_description: THE INITIAL is a hyper action game about pretty schoolgirls battling against evil. It's developed by a small team of five developers. We hope you will love this game as much as we do.

name: TheWalkerKiller VR
